   19: %%
   20: %%
   21: %% Test suite for the systools module.
   22: %%
   23: %%	The systools module is a wrapper for a number of modules that
   24: %%	handle large parts of the release building functionality
   25: %%	(e.g. checking app files, building a tar file, building
   26: %%	release upgrad scripts.
   27: %%
   28: 
   29: 
   30: -module(systools_SUITE).
   31: 
   32: -compile(export_all).
   33: 
   34: %%-define(debug, true).
   35: 
   36: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   37: -define(format(S, A), ok).
   38: -define(datadir, ?config(data_dir, Config)).
   39: -define(privdir, ?config(priv_dir, Config)).
   40: -define(copydir, ?config(copy_dir, Config)).
   41: 
   42: -include_lib("kernel/include/file.hrl").
   43: 
   44: -import(lists, [foldl/3]).
   45: 
   46: -define(default_timeout, test_server:minutes(20)).
   47: 
   48: 
   49: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   50: 
   51: suite() ->
   52:     [{ct_hooks, [ts_install_cth]}].
   53: 
   54: all() -> 
   55:     [{group, script}, {group, tar}, {group, relup}, {group, hybrid},
   56:      {group, options}].
   57: 
   58: groups() -> 
   59:     [{script, [],
   60:       [script_options, normal_script, start_script, unicode_script, no_mod_vsn_script,
   61:        wildcard_script, variable_script, abnormal_script,
   62:        no_sasl_script, no_dot_erlang_script,
   63:        src_tests_script, crazy_script, optional_apps_script,
   64:        included_script, included_override_script,
   65:        included_fail_script, included_bug_script, exref_script,
   66:        duplicate_modules_script, duplicate_entries_script,
   67:        otp_3065_circular_dependenies, included_and_used_sort_script]},
   68:      {tar, [],
   69:       [tar_options, relname_tar, normal_tar, no_mod_vsn_tar, system_files_tar,
   70:        system_src_file_tar, invalid_system_files_tar, variable_tar,
   71:        src_tests_tar, var_tar, exref_tar, link_tar, no_sasl_tar,
   72:        otp_9507_path_ebin, additional_files_tar, erts_tar]},
   73:      {relup, [],
   74:       [normal_relup, restart_relup, abnormal_relup, no_sasl_relup,
   75:        no_appup_relup, bad_appup_relup, app_start_type_relup, regexp_relup,
   76:        replace_app_relup
   77:       ]},
   78:      {hybrid, [], [normal_hybrid,hybrid_no_old_sasl,hybrid_no_new_sasl]},
   79:      {options, [], [otp_6226_outdir,app_file_defaults]}].
   80: 
   81: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   82:     Config.
   83: 
   84: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   85:     Config.
   86: 
   87: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   88: 
   89: 
   90: init_per_suite(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   91:     %% To use in end_per_testcase
   92:     Path = code:get_path(),
   93:     {ok,Cwd} = file:get_cwd(),
   94: 
   95:     %% Make of copy of the data directory.
   96:     DataDir = ?datadir,
   97:     PrivDir = ?privdir,
   98:     CopyDir = fname(PrivDir, "datacopy"),
   99:     ok = file:make_dir(CopyDir),
  100:     TarFile = fname(PrivDir, "datacopy.tgz"),
  101:     ok = file:set_cwd(DataDir),
  102:     ok = erl_tar:create(TarFile, ["."], [compressed]),
  103:     ok = erl_tar:extract(TarFile, [compressed, {cwd,CopyDir}]),
  104:     ok = file:delete(TarFile),
  105: 
  106:     %% Compile source files in the copy directory.
  107:     Sources = filelib:wildcard(fname([CopyDir,'*','*','*','*','*.erl'])),
  108:     lists:foreach(fun compile_source/1, Sources),
  109:     %% Deal with subdirectories, if any
  110:     SubSources = filelib:wildcard(fname([CopyDir,'*','*','*','*','*','*.erl'])),
  111:     lists:foreach(fun compile_subsource/1, SubSources),
  112: 
  113:     [{copy_dir, CopyDir}, {cwd,Cwd}, {path,Path} | Config].
  114: 
  115: compile_source(File) ->
  116:     %% The compiler will no longer create a Beam file
  117:     %% with a module name that does not match the output
  118:     %% file, so we must compile to a binary and write
  119:     %% the output file ourselves.
  120:     U = filename:dirname(filename:dirname(File)),
  121:     Base = filename:rootname(filename:basename(File)),
  122:     OutFile = filename:join([U,"ebin",Base++".beam"]),
  123:     OutFileTemp = OutFile ++ "#",
  124:     {ok,_,Code} = compile:file(File, [binary]),
  125:     ok = file:write_file(OutFileTemp, Code),
  126:     file:rename(OutFileTemp, OutFile).
  127: 
  128: compile_subsource(File) ->
  129:     %% Same as compile_source/1 but works a subdirectory lower
  130:     U = filename:dirname(filename:dirname(filename:dirname(File))),
  131:     Base = filename:rootname(filename:basename(File)),
  132:     OutFile = filename:join([U,"ebin",Base++".beam"]),
  133:     OutFileTemp = OutFile ++ "#",
  134:     {ok,_,Code} = compile:file(File, [binary]),
  135:     ok = file:write_file(OutFileTemp, Code),
  136:     file:rename(OutFileTemp, OutFile).
  137: 
  138: end_per_suite(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  139:     rh_test_lib:clean_dir(?privdir),
  140:     Config.
  141: 
  142: init_per_testcase(link_tar, Config) ->
  143:     case os:type() of
  144: 	{unix, _} -> init_per_testcase(dummy, Config);
  145: 	{win32, _} -> {skip, "Skip on windows"}
  146:     end;
  147: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
  148:     Dog = test_server:timetrap(?default_timeout),
  149:     [{watchdog, Dog}|Config].
  150: 
  151: end_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
  152:     try apply(?MODULE,Case,[cleanup,Config])
  153:     catch error:undef -> ok
  154:     end,
  155:     Dog=?config(watchdog, Config),
  156:     test_server:timetrap_cancel(Dog),
  157:     case {?config(path,Config),?config(cwd,Config)} of
  158: 	{undefined,undefined} ->
  159: 	    ok;
  160: 	{Path,Cwd} ->
  161: 	    true = code:set_path(Path),
  162: 	    ok = file:set_cwd(Cwd)
  163:     end,
  164:     ok.
  165: 
  166: 
  167: 
  168: %% Usage:
  169: %%    systools:make_script("RelName")
  170: %%                        Make a boot file from RelName.rel.
  171: %%                        Generates RelName.{script,boot}
  172: %%    systools:make_tar("RelName")
  173: %%                        Make a release package from RelName.rel.
  174: %%                        Generates RelName.tar,Z
  175: %%    systools:script2boot(File)
  176: %%                        File.script -> File.boot
  177: %%    systools:make_relup("Target", ["UpFromRel"...], ["DownToRel"...], Opts)
  178: %%			  Gather all appup scripts to the relup file
  179: %%
  180: 
  181: 
  182: %% make_script: Check illegal script options
  183: script_options(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  184:     {'EXIT',{{badarg,[{path,["Path",12,"Another"]}]}, _}} =
  185: 	(catch systools:make_script("release", [{path,["Path",12,"Another"]}])),
  186:     {'EXIT',{{badarg,[sillent]}, _}} =
  187: 	(catch systools:make_script("release",
  188: 				    [{path,["Path","Another"]},sillent])),
  189:     {'EXIT',{{badarg,[locall]}, _}} =
  190: 	(catch systools:make_script("release",
  191: 				    [{path,["Path","Another"]},locall])),
  192:     {'EXIT',{{badarg,[src_testsxx]}, _}} =
  193: 	(catch systools:make_script("release",
  194: 				    [{path,["Path"]},src_testsxx])),
  195:     {'EXIT',{{badarg,[{variables, {"TEST", "/home/lib"}}]}, _}} =
  196: 	(catch systools:make_script("release",
  197: 				    [{variables, {"TEST", "/home/lib"}}])),
  198:     {'EXIT',{{badarg,[{variables, [{a, b}, {"a", "b"}]}]}, _}} =
  199: 	(catch systools:make_script("release",
  200: 				    [{variables, [{a, b}, {"a", "b"}]}])),
  201:     {'EXIT',{{badarg,[exreff]}, _}} =
  202: 	(catch systools:make_script("release",
  203: 				    [{path,["Path","Another"]},exreff])),
  204:     {'EXIT',{{badarg,[{exref,["appl"]}]}, _}} =
  205: 	(catch systools:make_script("release", [{exref,["appl"]}])),
  206:     {'EXIT',{{badarg,[{machine, "appl"}]}, _}} =
  207: 	(catch systools:make_script("release", [{machine,"appl"}])),
  208:     ok.
  209: 
  210: 
  211: %% make_script: Check that normal case
  212: normal_script(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  213:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
  214:     PSAVE = code:get_path(),		% Save path
  215: 
  216:     {LatestDir, LatestName} = create_script(latest,Config),
  217: 
  218:     DataDir = filename:absname(?copydir),
  219:     LibDir = fname([DataDir, d_normal, lib]),
  220:     P1 = fname([LibDir, 'db-2.1', ebin]),
  221:     P2 = fname([LibDir, 'fe-3.1', ebin]),
  222: 
  223:     true = code:add_patha(P1),
  224:     true = code:add_patha(P2),
  225: 
  226:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir),
  227: 
  228:     ok = systools:make_script(filename:basename(LatestName)),
  229:     {ok, _} = read_script_file(LatestName),	% Check readabillity
  230: 
  231:     %% Check the same but w. silent flag
  232:     {ok, _, []} = systools:make_script(LatestName, [silent]),
  233:     {ok, _, []} = systools:make_script(LatestName, [silent,warnings_as_errors]),
  234: 
  235:     %% Use the local option
  236:     ok = systools:make_script(LatestName, [local]),
  237:     ok = check_script_path(LatestName),
  238: 
  239:     %% use the path option
  240:     code:set_path(PSAVE),			% Restore path
  241:     %% Mess up std path:
  242:     true = code:add_patha(fname([LibDir, 'db-1.0', ebin])),
  243:     true = code:add_patha(fname([LibDir, 'fe-2.1', ebin])),
  244: 
  245:     error = systools:make_script(LatestName),	%should fail
  246:     ok = systools:make_script(LatestName,[{path, [P1, P2]}]),
  247: 
  248:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir),
  249:     code:set_path(PSAVE),			% Restore path
  250:     ok.
  251: 
  252: %% make_script: Check that script can be named start.script
  253: start_script(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  254:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
  255:     PSAVE = code:get_path(),		% Save path
  256: 
  257:     {LatestDir, LatestName} = create_script(latest,Config),
  258: 
  259:     DataDir = filename:absname(?copydir),
  260:     LibDir = fname([DataDir, d_normal, lib]),
  261:     P1 = fname([LibDir, 'db-2.1', ebin]),
  262:     P2 = fname([LibDir, 'fe-3.1', ebin]),
  263: 
  264:     true = code:add_patha(P1),
  265:     true = code:add_patha(P2),
  266: 
  267:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir),
  268: 
  269:     ok = systools:make_script(filename:basename(LatestName), [{script_name, "start"}]),
  270:     {ok, _} = read_script_file("start"),	% Check readabillity
  271: 
  272:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir),
  273:     code:set_path(PSAVE),			% Restore path
  274:     ok.
  275: 
  276: %% make_script: Test make_script with unicode .app file
  277: unicode_script(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  278:     UnicodeStr = [945,946], % alhpa beta in greek letters
  279: 
  280:     {LatestDir, LatestName} = create_script({unicode,UnicodeStr},Config),
  281: 
  282:     DataDir = filename:absname(?copydir),
  283:     UnicodeApp = fname([DataDir, "d_unicode", "lib", "ua-1.0"]),
  284:     TarFile = fname(?privdir, "unicode_app.tgz"),
  285:     {ok, Tar} = erl_tar:open(TarFile, [write, compressed]),
  286:     ok = erl_tar:add(Tar, UnicodeApp, "ua-1.0", [compressed]),
  287:     ok = erl_tar:close(Tar),
  288: 
  289:     UnicodeLibDir = fname([DataDir, "d_unicode", UnicodeStr]),
  290:     P1 = fname([UnicodeLibDir, "ua-1.0", "ebin"]),
  291: 
  292:     %% Need to do this on a separate node to make sure it has unicode
  293:     %% filename mode (+fnu*)
  294:     {ok,Peer,Node} = ?CT_PEER(["+fnui"]),
  295: 
  296:     ok = rpc:call(Node,erl_tar,extract,
  297: 		  [TarFile, [{cwd,UnicodeLibDir},compressed]]),
  298: 
  299:     true = rpc:call(Node,code,add_patha,[P1]),
  300: 
  301:     ok = rpc:call(Node,file,set_cwd,[LatestDir]),
  302: 
  303:     ok = rpc:call(Node,systools,make_script,[filename:basename(LatestName),
  304: 					     [local]]),
  305: 
  306:     {ok, Script} = rpc:call(Node,file,consult,[LatestName++".script"]),
  307: 
  308:     %% For debug purpose - print script to log
  309:     io:format("~tp~n",[Script]),
  310: 
  311:     %% check that script contains unicode strings in
  312:     %% 1. release version (set in ?MODULE:do_create_script)
  313:     [{script,{"Test release",UnicodeStr},Instr}] = Script,
  314: 
  315:     %% 2. application description (set in ua.app in data dir)
  316:     [AppInfo] = [X || {apply,{application,load,[{application,ua,X}]}} <- Instr],
  317:     {description,UnicodeStr} = lists:keyfind(description,1,AppInfo),
  318: 
  319:     %% 3. path (directory name where unicode_app.tgz is extracted)
  320:     true = lists:member({path,[P1]},Instr),
  321: 
  322:     %% If all is good, delete the unicode dir to avoid lingering files
  323:     %% on windows.
  324:     rpc:call(Node,code,add_pathz,[filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE))]),
  325:     rpc:call(Node,?MODULE,delete_tree,[UnicodeLibDir]),
  326: 
  327:     peer:stop(Peer),
  328: 
  329:     ok.
  330: 
  331: unicode_script(cleanup,Config) ->
  332:     file:delete(fname(?privdir, "unicode_app.tgz")),
  333:     ok.
  334: 
  335: %% make_script: Check that script handles optional apps.
  336: optional_apps_script(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  337:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
  338:     PSAVE = code:get_path(),        % Save path
  339: 
  340:     DataDir = filename:absname(?copydir),
  341:     LibDir = fname([DataDir, d_opt_apps, lib]),
  342:     P1 = fname([LibDir, 'app1-1.0', ebin]),
  343:     P2 = fname([LibDir, 'app2-1.0', ebin]),
  344:     true = code:add_patha(P1),
  345:     true = code:add_patha(P2),
  346: 
  347:     %% First assemble a release without the optional app
  348:     {OptDir, OptName} = create_script(optional_apps_missing,Config),
  349:     ok = file:set_cwd(OptDir),
  350:     ok = systools:make_script(filename:basename(OptName), [{script_name, "start"}]),
  351:     {ok, [{script,_,OptCommands}]} = read_script_file("start"),
  352: 
  353:     %% Check optional_applications is part of the generated script
  354:     [[app2]] =
  355: 	[proplists:get_value(optional_applications, Properties) ||
  356: 	     {apply,{application,load,[{application,app1,Properties}]}} <- OptCommands],
  357: 
  358:     %% And there is no app2
  359:     [] =
  360: 	[ok || {apply,{application,load,[{application,app2,_}]}} <- OptCommands],
  361: 
  362:     %% Now let's include the optional app
  363:     {AllDir, AllName} = create_script(optional_apps_all,Config),
  364:     ok = file:set_cwd(AllDir),
  365:     ok = systools:make_script(filename:basename(AllName), [{script_name, "start"}]),
  366:     {ok, [{script,_,AllCommands}]} = read_script_file("start"),
  367: 
  368:     %% Check boot order is still correct
  369:     BootOrder = [App || {apply,{application,start_boot,[App,permanent]}} <- AllCommands],
  370:     [kernel, stdlib, sasl, app2, app1] = BootOrder,
  371: 
  372:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir),
  373:     code:set_path(PSAVE),           % Restore path
  374:     ok.
  375: 
  376: %% make_script:
  377: %% Modules specified without version in .app file (db-3.1).
  378: %% Note that this is now the normal way - i.e. systools now ignores
  379: %% the module versions in the .app file.
  380: no_mod_vsn_script(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  381:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
  382:     PSAVE = code:get_path(),		% Save path
  383: 
  384:     {LatestDir, LatestName} = create_script(latest_no_mod_vsn,Config),
  385: 
  386:     DataDir = filename:absname(?copydir),
  387:     LibDir = fname([DataDir, d_normal, lib]),
  388:     P1 = fname([LibDir, 'db-3.1', ebin]),
  389:     P2 = fname([LibDir, 'fe-3.1', ebin]),
  390: 
  391:     true = code:add_patha(P1),
  392:     true = code:add_patha(P2),
  393: 
  394:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir),
  395: 
  396:     ok = systools:make_script(filename:basename(LatestName)),
  397:     {ok, _} = read_script_file(LatestName),	% Check readabillity
  398: 
  399:     %% Check the same but w. silent flag
  400:     {ok, _, []} = systools:make_script(LatestName, [silent]),
  401: 
  402:     %% Use the local option
  403:     ok = systools:make_script(LatestName, [local]),
  404:     ok = check_script_path(LatestName),
  405: 
  406:     %% use the path option
  407:     code:set_path(PSAVE),			% Restore path
  408:     %% Mess up std path:
  409:     true = code:add_patha(fname([LibDir, 'db-1.0', ebin])),
  410:     true = code:add_patha(fname([LibDir, 'fe-2.1', ebin])),
  411: 
  412:     error = systools:make_script(LatestName),	%should fail
  413:     ok = systools:make_script(LatestName,
  414: 			      [{path, [P1, P2]}]),
  415: 
  416:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir),
  417:     code:set_path(PSAVE),			% Restore path
  418:     ok.
  419: 
  420: 
  421: %% make_script: Check that make_script handles wildcards in path.
  422: wildcard_script(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  423:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
  424: 
  425:     {LatestDir, LatestName} = create_script(latest,Config),
  426: 
  427:     DataDir = filename:absname(?copydir),
  428:     LibDir = fname([DataDir, d_normal, lib]),
  429:     WildDir = fname([LibDir, '*', ebin]),
  430: 
  431:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir),
  432: 
  433:     error = systools:make_script(filename:basename(LatestName)),
  434: 
  435:     ok = systools:make_script(LatestName,
  436: 			      [{path, [WildDir]}]),
  437: 
  438:     {ok, _} = read_script_file(LatestName),	% Check readabillity
  439: 
  440:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir),
  441:     ok.
  442: 
  443: 
  444: %% make_script: Add own installation dependent variable in script.
  445: variable_script(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  446:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
  447: 
  448:     {LatestDir, LatestName} = create_script(latest,Config),
  449: 
  450:     DataDir = filename:absname(?copydir),
  451:     LibDir = fname([DataDir, d_normal, lib]),
  452:     P = [fname([LibDir, 'db-2.1', ebin]),
  453: 	 fname([LibDir, 'fe-3.1', ebin])],
  454: 
  455:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir),
  456: 
  457:     ok = systools:make_script(LatestName,
  458: 			      [{path, P},
  459: 			       {variables, [{"TEST", LibDir}]}]),
  460: 
  461:     %% Check variables
  462:     ok = check_var_script_file([fname(['$TEST', 'db-2.1', ebin]),
  463: 				fname(['$TEST', 'fe-3.1', ebin])],
  464: 			       P,
  465: 			       LatestName),
  466: 
  467:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir),
  468:     ok.
  469: 
  470: %% make_script: Duplicate entries in app file
  471: duplicate_entries_script(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  472:     DataDir = ?datadir,
  473:     create_apps_duplicate_entry(DataDir),
  474:     {LatestDir, LatestName} = create_script(latest_t21,Config),
  475:     error = systools:make_script(LatestName,
  476:         [{path, [DataDir, LatestDir]}]),
  477:     {LatestDir2, LatestName2} = create_script(latest_t22,Config),
  478:     ok = systools:make_script(LatestName2,
  479:         [{path, [DataDir, LatestDir2]}]),
  480:     ok.
  481: 
  482: %% make_script: Abnormal cases.
  483: abnormal_script(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  484:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
  485: 
  486:     {LatestDir, LatestName} = create_script(latest,Config),
  487: 
  488:     DataDir = filename:absname(?copydir),
  489: 
  490:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir),
  491:     LibDir = fname([DataDir, d_bad_app_vsn, lib]),
  492:     P = [fname([LibDir, 'db-2.1', ebin]),
  493: 	 fname([LibDir, 'fe-3.1', ebin])],
  494: 
  495:     %% Check wrong app vsn
  496:     error = systools:make_script(LatestName, [{path, P}]),
  497:     {error,
  498:      systools_make,
  499:      [{error_reading, {db, {no_valid_version,
  500: 			    {{"should be","2.1"},
  501: 			     {"found file", _, "2.0"}}}}}]} =
  502: 	systools:make_script(LatestName, [silent, {path, P}]),
  503: 
  504:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir),
  505:     ok.
  506: 
  507: 
  508: %% make_script: Create script without sasl appl. Check warning.
  509: no_sasl_script(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  510:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
  511: 
  512:     {LatestDir, LatestName} = create_script(latest1_no_sasl,Config),
  513: 
  514:     DataDir = filename:absname(?copydir),
  515:     LibDir = [fname([DataDir, d_normal, lib])],
  516:     P = [fname([LibDir, '*', ebin]),
  517: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, kernel, ebin]),
  518: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, stdlib, ebin]),
  519: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, sasl, ebin])],
  520: 
  521:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir),
  522: 
  523:     {ok, _ , [{warning,missing_sasl}]} =
  524: 	systools:make_script(LatestName,[{path, P},silent]),
  525: 
  526:     {error, systools_make, {warnings_treated_as_errors,[missing_sasl]}} =
  527: 	systools:make_script(LatestName,[{path, P},silent,warnings_as_errors]),
  528: 
  529:     {ok, _ , []} =
  530: 	systools:make_script(LatestName,[{path, P},silent, no_warn_sasl]),
  531: 
  532:     {ok, _ , []} =
  533: 	systools:make_script(LatestName,[{path, P},silent, no_warn_sasl,
  534:                                          warnings_as_errors]),
  535: 
  536:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir),
  537:     ok.
  538: 
  539: %% make_script: Create script with no_dot_erlang. Check script contents.
  540: no_dot_erlang_script(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  541:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
  542: 
  543:     {LatestDir, LatestName} = create_script(latest1_no_sasl,Config),
  544: 
  545:     DataDir = filename:absname(?copydir),
  546:     LibDir = [fname([DataDir, d_normal, lib])],
  547:     P = [fname([LibDir, '*', ebin]),
  548: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, kernel, ebin]),
  549: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, stdlib, ebin]),
  550: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, sasl, ebin])],
  551: 
  552:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir),
  553: 
  554:     {ok, _ , []} =
  555: 	systools:make_script(LatestName,[{path, P},silent, no_warn_sasl]),
  556:     {ok, [{_, _, LoadDotErlang}]} = read_script_file(LatestName),
  557:     [erlangrc] = [E || {apply, {c, E, []}} <- LoadDotErlang],
  558: 
  559:     {ok, _ , []} =
  560: 	systools:make_script(LatestName,[{path, P},silent, no_warn_sasl, no_dot_erlang]),
  561:     {ok, [{_, _, DoNotLoadDotErlang}]} = read_script_file(LatestName),
  562:     [] = [E || {apply, {c, E, []}} <- DoNotLoadDotErlang],
  563: 
  564:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir),
  565:     ok.
  566: 
  567: 
  568: %% make_script: Do not check date of object file or that source code
  569: %% can be found.
  570: src_tests_script(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  571:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
  572:     PSAVE = code:get_path(),		% Save path
  573: 
  574:     {LatestDir, LatestName} = create_script(latest,Config),
  575:     BootFile = LatestName ++ ".boot",
  576: 
  577:     DataDir = filename:absname(?copydir),
  578:     LibDir = fname([DataDir, d_missing_src, lib]),
  579:     P1 = fname([LibDir, 'db-2.1', ebin]),
  580:     P2 = fname([LibDir, 'fe-3.1', ebin]),
  581:     N = [P1, P2],
  582: 
  583:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir),
  584: 
  585:     %% Manipulate the modification date of a beam file so it seems
  586:     %% older than its .erl file
  587:     Erl = filename:join([P1,"..","src","db1.erl"]),
  588:     {ok, FileInfo=#file_info{mtime={{Y,M,D},T}}} = file:read_file_info(Erl),
  589:     Beam = filename:join(P1,"db1.beam"),
  590:     ok=file:write_file_info(Beam, FileInfo#file_info{mtime={{Y-1,M,D},T}}),
  591: 
  592:     %% Remove a .erl file
  593:     Erl2 = filename:join([P1,"..","src","db2.erl"]),
  594:     file:delete(Erl2),
  595: 
  596:     %% Then make script
  597: 
  598:     %% .boot file should not exist
  599:     ok = file:delete(BootFile),
  600:     false = filelib:is_regular(BootFile),
  601:     %% With warnings_as_errors and src_tests option, an error should be issued
  602:     {error, systools_make,
  603:      {warnings_treated_as_errors, [{obj_out_of_date,_},
  604:                                    {source_not_found,_}]}} =
  605: 	systools:make_script(LatestName, [silent, {path, N}, src_tests,
  606: 					  warnings_as_errors]),
  607:     error =
  608: 	systools:make_script(LatestName, [{path, N}, src_tests,
  609: 					  warnings_as_errors]),
  610: 
  611:     %% due to warnings_as_errors .boot file should still not exist
  612:     false = filelib:is_regular(BootFile),
  613: 
  614:     %% Two warnings should be issued when src_tests is given
  615:     %% 1. old object code for db1.beam
  616:     %% 2. missing source code for db2.beam
  617:     {ok, _, [{warning,{obj_out_of_date,_}},
  618: 	     {warning,{source_not_found,_}}]} =
  619: 	systools:make_script(LatestName, [silent, {path, N}, src_tests]),
  620: 
  621:     %% .boot file should exist now
  622:     true = filelib:is_regular(BootFile),
  623: 
  624:     %% Without the src_tests option, no warning should be issued
  625:     {ok, _, []} =
  626: 	systools:make_script(LatestName, [silent, {path, N}]),
  627: 
  628:     %% Check that the old no_module_tests option (from the time when
  629:     %% it was default to do the src_test) is ignored
  630:     {ok, _, [{warning,{obj_out_of_date,_}},
  631: 	     {warning,{source_not_found,_}}]} =
  632: 	systools:make_script(LatestName, [silent,
  633: 					  {path, N},
  634: 					  no_module_tests,
  635: 					  src_tests]),
  636: 
  637:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir),
  638:     code:set_path(PSAVE),
  639:     ok.
  640: 
  641: %% make_script: Do the crazy cases.
  642: crazy_script(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  643:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
  644: 
  645:     {LatestDir, LatestName} = create_script(latest, Config),
  646: 
  647:     DataDir = filename:absname(?copydir),
  648:     LibDir = fname([DataDir, d_normal, lib]),
  649:     P = [fname([LibDir, 'db-2.1', ebin]),
  650: 	 fname([LibDir, 'fe-3.1', ebin])],
  651: 
  652:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir),
  653: 
  654:     %% Run with bad path
  655:     error = systools:make_script(LatestName),
  656:     {error, _, [{error_reading, _}, {error_reading, _}]} =
  657: 	systools:make_script(LatestName, [silent]),
  658: 
  659:     %% Run with .rel file lacking kernel
  660:     {LatestDir2, LatestName2} = create_script(latest_nokernel, Config),
  661:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir2),
  662: 
  663:     error = systools:make_script(LatestName2),
  664:     {error, _, {missing_mandatory_app,kernel}} =
  665: 	systools:make_script(LatestName2, [silent,{path,P}]),
  666: 
  667:     %% Run with .rel file with non-permanent kernel
  668:     {LatestDir3, LatestName3} = create_script(latest_kernel_start_type, Config),
  669:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir3),
  670: 
  671:     error = systools:make_script(LatestName3),
  672:     {error, _, {mandatory_app,kernel,load}} =
  673: 	systools:make_script(LatestName3, [silent,{path,P}]),
  674: 
  675:     %% Run with .rel file with non-permanent stdlib
  676:     {LatestDir4, LatestName4} = create_script(latest_stdlib_start_type, Config),
  677:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir4),
  678: 
  679:     error = systools:make_script(LatestName4),
  680:     {error, _, {mandatory_app,stdlib,load}} =
  681: 	systools:make_script(LatestName4, [silent,{path,P}]),
  682: 
  683:     %% Run with .rel file lacking stdlib
  684:     {LatestDir5, LatestName5} = create_script(latest_no_stdlib, Config),
  685:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir5),
  686: 
  687:     error = systools:make_script(LatestName5),
  688:     {error, _, {missing_mandatory_app,stdlib}} =
  689: 	systools:make_script(LatestName5, [silent,{path,P}]),
  690: 
  691:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir),
  692:     ok.
  693: 
  694: %% make_script: Check that make_script handles generation of script
  695: %% for applications with included applications.
  696: included_script(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  697:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
  698:     {LatestDir, LatestName} = create_include_files(inc1, Config),
  699:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir),
  700:     ok = systools:make_script(LatestName),
  701:     ok = check_include_script(LatestName,
  702: 			      [t1, t2, t3, t5, t4, t6],
  703: 			      [t1, t3, t6]),
  704:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir),
  705:     ok.
  706: 
  707: %% make_script: Check that make_script handles generation of script
  708: %% for applications with included applications which are override by
  709: %% the .rel file.
  710: included_override_script(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  711:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
  712:     {LatestDir, LatestName} = create_include_files(inc2, Config),
  713:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir),
  714:     ok = systools:make_script(LatestName),
  715:     ok = check_include_script(LatestName,
  716: 			      [t1, t2, t3, t4, t6, t5],
  717: 			      [t1, t3, t6, t5]),
  718: 
  719:     {_, LatestName1} = create_include_files(inc3, Config),
  720:     ok = systools:make_script(LatestName1),
  721:     ok = check_include_script(LatestName1,
  722: 			      [t3, t5, t4, t6, t1, t2],
  723: 			      [t3, t6, t1, t2]),
  724: 
  725:     {_, LatestName2} = create_include_files(inc4, Config),
  726:     ok = systools:make_script(LatestName2),
  727:     ok = check_include_script(LatestName2,
  728: 			      [t3, t4, t6, t5, t1, t2],
  729: 			      [t3, t6, t5, t1, t2]),
  730: 
  731:     {_, LatestName3} = create_include_files(inc5, Config),
  732:     ok = systools:make_script(LatestName3),
  733:     ok = check_include_script(LatestName3,
  734: 			      [t3, t4, t6, t1, t2],
  735: 			      [t3, t6, t1, t2]),
  736: 
  737:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir),
  738:     ok.

  791: %% Test sorting of included applications and used applications
  792: included_and_used_sort_script(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  793:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),

  799: 
  800:     {LatestDir2, LatestName2} = create_include_files(sort_apps_rev, Config),
  801:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir2),
  802:     ok = systools:make_script(LatestName2),
  803:     ok = check_include_script(LatestName2,
  804: 			      [t18,t19,t20,t15,t16,t17,t14],[t18,t19,t20,t14]),
  805:

  809: 
  810: %% make_script: Check that make_script exref option works.
  811: exref_script(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  812:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
  813:     PSAVE = code:get_path(),		% Save path
  814: 
  815:     {LatestDir, LatestName} = create_script(latest,Config),
  816: 
  817:     DataDir = filename:absname(?copydir),
  818:     LibDir = fname([DataDir, d_normal, lib]),
  819:     P = [fname([LibDir, 'db-2.1', ebin]),
  820: 	 fname([LibDir, 'fe-3.1', ebin])],
  821: 
  822:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir),
  823: 
  824:     {ok, _, []} = systools:make_script(LatestName, [{path,P}, silent]),
  825: 
  826:     %% Complete exref
  827:     {ok, _, W1} =
  828: 	systools:make_script(LatestName, [exref, {path,P}, silent]),
  829:     check_exref_warnings(with_db1, W1),
  830:     {ok, _} = read_script_file(LatestName),	% Check readabillity
  831: 
  832:     %% Only exref the db application.
  833:     {ok, _, W2} =
  834: 	systools:make_script(LatestName, [{exref,[db]}, {path,P}, silent]),
  835:     check_exref_warnings(with_db1, W2),
  836:     {ok, _} = read_script_file(LatestName),	% Check readabillity
  837: 
  838:     %% Only exref the fe application.
  839:     {ok, _, W3} =
  840: 	systools:make_script(LatestName, [{exref,[fe]}, {path,P}, silent]),
  841:     check_exref_warnings(without_db1, W3),
  842:     {ok, _} = read_script_file(LatestName),	% Check readabillity
  843: 
  844:     %% exref the db and stdlib applications.
  845:     {ok, _, W4} =
  846: 	systools:make_script(LatestName, [{exref,[db,stdlib]}, {path,P}, silent]),
  847:     check_exref_warnings(with_db1, W4),
  848:     {ok, _} = read_script_file(LatestName),	% Check readabillity
  849:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir),
  850:     code:set_path(PSAVE),			% Restore path
  851:     ok.
  852: 
  853: check_exref_warnings(with_db1, W) ->
  854:     case get_exref(undef, W) of
  855: 	{ok, [{db2,non_existing_func,0},
  856: 	      {fe2,non_existing_func,0},
  857: 	      {lists,non_existing_func,1}]} ->
  858: 	    ok;
  859: 	{ok, L} ->
  860: 	    ct:fail({exref_warning_undef, L});
  861: 	_E ->
  862: 	    ct:fail({bad_undef,_E})
  863:     end;
  864: check_exref_warnings(without_db1, W) ->
  865:     case get_exref(undef, W) of
  866: 	false ->
  867: 	    ok;
  868: 	{ok, L} ->
  869: 	    ct:fail({exref_warning_undef, L})
  870:     end.
  871: 
  872: get_exref(undef, W)   -> filter(get_exref1(exref_undef, W)).
  873: 
  874: filter(false) ->
  875:     false;
  876: filter({ok, W}) ->
  877:     {ok, filter(W)};
  878: filter(L) ->
  879:     lists:filter(fun
  880: 		     ({int,_,_}) -> false;
  881: 		     ({i,_,_}) -> false;
  882: 		     ({crypto,_,_}) -> false;
  883: 		     (_) -> true
  884: 		end,
  885: 		 L).
  886: 
  887: get_exref1(T, [{warning, {T, Value}}|_]) -> {ok, Value};
  888: get_exref1(T, [_|W])                     -> get_exref1(T, W);
  889: get_exref1(_, [])                        -> false.
  890: 
  891: %% duplicate_modules_script: Check that make_script rejects two
  892: %% applications providing the same module.
  893: duplicate_modules_script(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  894:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
  895: 
  896:     {LatestDir, LatestName} = create_script(duplicate_modules,Config),
  897: 
  898:     DataDir = filename:absname(?copydir),
  899: 
  900:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir),
  901:     LibDir = fname([DataDir, d_duplicate_modules, lib]),
  902:     P = [fname([LibDir, 'app1-1.0', ebin]),
  903: 	 fname([LibDir, 'app2-1.0', ebin])],
  904: 
  905:     %% Check wrong app vsn
  906:     error = systools:make_script(LatestName, [{path, P}]),
  907:     {error,
  908:       systools_make,
  909:       {duplicate_modules, [
  910:           {{myapp,app1,_}, {myapp,app2,_}}
  911:         ]
  912:       }
  913:     } = systools:make_script(LatestName, [silent, {path, P}]),
  914: 
  915:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir),
  916:     ok.
  917: 
  918: %% tar_options: Check illegal tar options.
  919: tar_options(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  920:     {'EXIT',{{badarg,[{path,["Path",12,"Another"]}]}, _}} =
  921: 	(catch systools:make_tar("release", [{path,["Path",12,"Another"]}])),
  922:     {'EXIT',{{badarg,[sillent]}, _}} =
  923: 	(catch systools:make_tar("release",
  924: 				 [{path,["Path","Another"]},sillent])),
  925:     {'EXIT',{{badarg,[{dirs,["dirs"]}]}, _}} =
  926: 	(catch systools:make_tar("release", [{dirs, ["dirs"]}])),
  927:     {'EXIT',{{badarg,[{erts, illegal}]}, _}} =
  928: 	(catch systools:make_tar("release", [{erts, illegal}])),
  929:     {'EXIT',{{badarg,[src_testsxx]}, _}} =
  930: 	(catch systools:make_tar("release",
  931: 				 [{path,["Path"]},src_testsxx])),
  932:     {'EXIT',{{badarg,[{variables, [{a, b}, {"a", "b"}]}]}, _}} =
  933: 	(catch systools:make_tar("release",
  934: 				 [{variables, [{a, b}, {"a", "b"}]}])),
  935:     {'EXIT',{{badarg,[{var_tar, illegal}]}, _}} =
  936: 	(catch systools:make_tar("release", [{var_tar, illegal}])),
  937:     {'EXIT',{{badarg,[exreff]}, _}} =
  938: 	(catch systools:make_tar("release",
  939: 				 [{path,["Path","Another"]},exreff])),
  940:     {'EXIT',{{badarg,[{exref,["appl"]}]}, _}} =
  941: 	(catch systools:make_tar("release", [{exref,["appl"]}])),
  942:     {'EXIT',{{badarg,[{machine, "appl"}]}, _}} =
  943: 	(catch systools:make_tar("release", [{machine,"appl"}])),
  944:     ok.
  945: 
  946: 
  947: %% make_tar: Check case of start.boot
  948: normal_tar(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  949:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
  950: 
  951:     {LatestDir, LatestName} = create_script(latest,Config),
  952: 
  953:     DataDir = filename:absname(?copydir),
  954:     LibDir = fname([DataDir, d_normal, lib]),
  955:     P = [fname([LibDir, 'db-2.1', ebin]),
  956: 	 fname([LibDir, 'fe-3.1', ebin])],
  957: 
  958:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir),
  959: 
  960:     {ok, _, []} = systools:make_script(LatestName, [silent, {path, P}, {script_name, "start"}]),
  961:     ok = systools:make_tar(LatestName, [{path, P}]),
  962:     ok = check_tar(fname([lib,'db-2.1',ebin,'db.app']), LatestName),
  963:     {ok, _, []} = systools:make_tar(LatestName, [{path, P}, silent]),
  964:     ok = check_tar(fname([lib,'fe-3.1',ebin,'fe.app']), LatestName),
  965: 
  966:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir),
  967:     ok.
  968:

  970: relname_tar(Config) when is_list(Config) ->

  985:     {ok, _, []} = systools:make_tar(LatestName, [{path, P}, silent]),
  986:     ok = check_tar(fname([lib,'fe-3.1',ebin,'fe.app']), LatestName),
  987: 
  988:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir),
  989:     ok.

  993: %% the module versions in the .app file.

 1001:     P = [fname([LibDir, 'db-3.1', ebin]),
 1002: 	 fname([LibDir, 'fe-3.1', ebin])],
 1003: 
 1004:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir),
 1005:

 1007:     ok = systools:make_tar(LatestName, [{path, P}]),
 1008:     ok = check_tar(fname([lib,'db-3.1',ebin,'db.app']), LatestName),

 1010:     ok = check_tar(fname([lib,'fe-3.1',ebin,'fe.app']), LatestName),

 1016: %% make_tar: Check that relup or sys.config are included if they exist
 1017: system_files_tar(Config) ->
 1018:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
 1019: 
 1020:     {LatestDir, LatestName} = create_script(latest,Config),
 1021: 
 1022:     DataDir = filename:absname(?copydir),
 1023:     LibDir = fname([DataDir, d_normal, lib]),
 1024:     P = [fname([LibDir, 'db-2.1', ebin]),
 1025: 	 fname([LibDir, 'fe-3.1', ebin])],
 1026: 
 1027:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir),
 1028: 
 1029:     %% Add dummy relup and sys.config
 1030:     ok = file:write_file("sys.config","[].\n"),
 1031:     ok = file:write_file("relup","{\"LATEST\",[],[]}.\n"),
 1032: 
 1033:     {ok, _, []} = systools:make_script(LatestName, [silent, {path, P}]),
 1034:     ok = systools:make_tar(LatestName, [{path, P}]),
 1035:     ok = check_tar(fname(["releases","LATEST","sys.config"]), LatestName),
 1036:     ok = check_tar(fname(["releases","LATEST","relup"]), LatestName),
 1037:     {ok, _, []} = systools:make_tar(LatestName, [{path, P}, silent]),
 1038:     ok = check_tar(fname(["releases","LATEST","sys.config"]), LatestName),
 1039:     ok = check_tar(fname(["releases","LATEST","relup"]), LatestName),
 1040: 
 1041:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir),
 1042: 
 1043:     ok.
 1044: 
 1045: %% make_tar: Check that extra_files are included in the tarball
 1046: additional_files_tar(Config) ->
 1047:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
 1048: 
 1049:     {LatestDir, LatestName} = create_script(latest,Config),
 1050: 
 1051:     DataDir = filename:absname(?copydir),
 1052:     LibDir = fname([DataDir, d_normal, lib]),
 1053:     P = [fname([LibDir, 'db-2.1', ebin]),
 1054: 	 fname([LibDir, 'fe-3.1', ebin])],
 1055: 
 1056:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir),
 1057: 
 1058:     %% Add dummy relup and sys.config
 1059:     ok = file:write_file("sys.config","[].\n"),
 1060:     ok = file:write_file("relup","{\"LATEST\",[],[]}.\n"),
 1061: 
 1062:     %% unrelated files that must be included explicitly
 1063:     RandomFile = "somefile",
 1064:     ok = file:write_file(RandomFile,"hello\n"),
 1065: 
 1066:     TopLevelDir = "some_dir",
 1067:     TopLevelFile = filename:join(TopLevelDir, "top_level_file"),
 1068: 
 1069:     filelib:ensure_dir(TopLevelFile),
 1070:     ok = file:write_file(TopLevelFile, "hello there\n"),
 1071: 
 1072:     {ok, _, []} = systools:make_script(LatestName, [silent, {path, P}]),
 1073:     ok = systools:make_tar(LatestName, [{path, P}]),
 1074:     ok = check_tar(fname(["releases","LATEST","sys.config"]), LatestName),
 1075:     ok = check_tar(fname(["releases","LATEST","relup"]), LatestName),
 1076:     %% random file should not be in this tarball
 1077:     {error, _} = check_tar(fname(["releases","LATEST",RandomFile]), LatestName),
 1078: 
 1079:     RandomFilePathInTar = filename:join(["releases", "LATEST", RandomFile]),
 1080: 
 1081:     {ok, _, []} = systools:make_tar(LatestName,
 1082:                                     [{path, P}, silent,
 1083:                                      {extra_files, [{RandomFile, RandomFilePathInTar},
 1084:                                                     {TopLevelDir, TopLevelDir}]}]),
 1085:     ok = check_tar(fname(["releases","LATEST","sys.config"]), LatestName),
 1086:     ok = check_tar(fname(["releases","LATEST","relup"]), LatestName),
 1087: 
 1088:     %% random file and dir should be in this tarball
 1089:     ok = check_tar(fname(["releases","LATEST",RandomFile]), LatestName),
 1090:     ok = check_tar(fname([TopLevelFile]), LatestName),
 1091: 
 1092:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir),
 1093: 
 1094:     ok.
 1095: 
 1096: system_files_tar(cleanup,Config) ->
 1097:     Dir = ?privdir,
 1098:     file:delete(filename:join(Dir,"sys.config")),
 1099:     file:delete(filename:join(Dir,"relup")),
 1100:     ok.
 1101: 
 1102: erts_tar(Config) ->
 1103: 
 1104:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
 1105: 
 1106:     {LatestDir, LatestName} = create_script(current_all,Config),
 1107: 
 1108:     ERTS_VSN = erlang:system_info(version),
 1109:     ERTS_DIR = fname(["erts-" ++ ERTS_VSN,bin]),
 1110: 
 1111:     %% List of all expected executable files in erts/bin
 1112:     %% This list needs to be kept up to date whenever a file is
 1113:     %% added or removed.
 1114:     {Default, Ignored} =
 1115:         case os:type()  of
 1116:             {unix,_} ->
 1117:                 {["beam.smp","dyn_erl","epmd","erl","erl_call","erl_child_setup",
 1118:                   "erlexec","erl.src","escript","heart","inet_gethost","run_erl",
 1119:                   "start","start_erl.src","start.src","to_erl"],
 1120:                  ["ct_run","dialyzer","erlc","typer","yielding_c_fun"]};
 1121:             {win32, _} ->
 1122:                 {["beam.smp.pdb","erl.exe",
 1123:                   "erl.pdb","erl_log.exe","erlexec.dll","erlsrv.exe","heart.exe",
 1124:                   "start_erl.exe","beam.smp.dll",
 1125:                   "epmd.exe","erl.ini","erl_call.exe",
 1126:                   "erlexec.pdb","escript.exe","inet_gethost.exe"],
 1127:                  ["dialyzer.exe","erlc.exe","yielding_c_fun.exe","ct_run.exe","typer.exe"]}
 1128:         end,
 1129: 
 1130:     ErtsTarContent =
 1131:         fun(TarName) ->
 1132:                 lists:sort(
 1133:                   [filename:basename(File)
 1134:                    || File <- tar_contents(TarName),
 1135:                       string:equal(filename:dirname(File),ERTS_DIR),
 1136:                       %% Filter out beam.*.smp.*
 1137:                       re:run(filename:basename(File), "beam\\.[^\\.]+\\.smp(\\.dll)?") == nomatch,
 1138:                       %% Filter out beam.*.emu.*
 1139:                       re:run(filename:basename(File), "beam\\.([^\\.]+\\.)?emu(\\.dll)?") == nomatch,
 1140:                       %% Filter out any erl_child_setup.*
 1141:                       re:run(filename:basename(File), "erl_child_setup\\..*") == nomatch
 1142:                   ])
 1143:         end,
 1144: 
 1145:     DataDir = filename:absname(?copydir),
 1146:     LibDir = fname([DataDir, d_normal, lib]),
 1147:     P = [fname([LibDir, 'db-2.1', ebin])],
 1148: 
 1149:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir),
 1150: 
 1151:     {ok, _, []} = systools:make_script(LatestName, [silent, {path, P}, {script_name, "start"}]),
 1152:     ok = systools:make_tar(LatestName, [{path, P}, {erts, code:root_dir()}]),
 1153:     ErtsContent = ErtsTarContent(LatestName),
 1154: 
 1155:     case lists:sort(Default) of
 1156:         ErtsContent ->
 1157:             ok;
 1158:         Expected ->
 1159:             ct:pal("Content: ~p",[ErtsContent]),
 1160:             ct:pal("Expected: ~p",[Expected]),
 1161:             ct:fail("Incorrect erts bin content")
 1162:     end,
 1163: 
 1164:     ok = systools:make_tar(LatestName, [{path, P},
 1165:                                         {erts, code:root_dir()},
 1166:                                         erts_all]),
 1167:     ErtsAllContent = ErtsTarContent(LatestName),
 1168: 
 1169:     case lists:sort(Default ++ Ignored) of
 1170:         ErtsAllContent ->
 1171:             ok;
 1172:         ExpectedIgn ->
 1173:             ct:pal("Content: ~p",[ErtsAllContent]),
 1174:             ct:pal("Expected: ~p",[ExpectedIgn]),
 1175:             ct:fail("Incorrect erts bin content")
 1176:     end,
 1177: 
 1178:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir),
 1179:     ok.
 1180: 
 1181: 
 1182: %% make_tar: Check that sys.config.src and not sys.config is included
 1183: system_src_file_tar(Config) ->
 1184:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
 1185: 
 1186:     {LatestDir, LatestName} = create_script(latest,Config),
 1187: 
 1188:     DataDir = filename:absname(?copydir),
 1189:     LibDir = fname([DataDir, d_normal, lib]),
 1190:     P = [fname([LibDir, 'db-2.1', ebin]),
 1191:          fname([LibDir, 'fe-3.1', ebin])],
 1192: 
 1193:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir),
 1194: 
 1195:     %% Add dummy sys.config and sys.config.src
 1196:     ok = file:write_file("sys.config.src","[${SOMETHING}].\n"),
 1197:     ok = file:write_file("sys.config","[].\n"),
 1198: 
 1199:     {ok, _, _} = systools:make_script(LatestName, [silent, {path, P}]),
 1200:     ok = systools:make_tar(LatestName, [{path, P}]),
 1201:     ok = check_tar(fname(["releases","LATEST","sys.config.src"]), LatestName),
 1202:     {error, _} = check_tar(fname(["releases","LATEST","sys.config"]), LatestName),
 1203:     {ok, _, _} = systools:make_tar(LatestName, [{path, P}, silent]),
 1204:     ok = check_tar(fname(["releases","LATEST","sys.config.src"]), LatestName),
 1205:     {error, _} = check_tar(fname(["releases","LATEST","sys.config"]), LatestName),
 1206: 
 1207:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir),
 1208: 
 1209:     ok.
 1210: 
 1211: system_src_file_tar(cleanup,Config) ->
 1212:     Dir = ?privdir,
 1213:     file:delete(filename:join(Dir,"sys.config")),
 1214:     file:delete(filename:join(Dir,"sys.config.src")),
 1215:     ok.
 1216: 
 1217: %% make_tar: Check that make_tar fails if relup or sys.config exist
 1218: %% but do not have valid content
 1219: invalid_system_files_tar(Config) ->
 1220:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
 1221: 
 1222:     {LatestDir, LatestName} = create_script(latest,Config),
 1223: 
 1224:     DataDir = filename:absname(?copydir),
 1225:     LibDir = fname([DataDir, d_normal, lib]),
 1226:     P = [fname([LibDir, 'db-2.1', ebin]),
 1227: 	 fname([LibDir, 'fe-3.1', ebin])],
 1228: 
 1229:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir),
 1230: 
 1231:     {ok, _, []} = systools:make_script(LatestName, [silent, {path, P}]),
 1232: 
 1233:     %% Add dummy relup and sys.config - faulty sys.config
 1234:     ok = file:write_file("sys.config","[]\n"), %!!! syntax error - missing '.'
 1235:     ok = file:write_file("relup","{\"LATEST\",[],[]}.\n"),
 1236: 
 1237:     error = systools:make_tar(LatestName, [{path, P}]),
 1238:     {error,_,{tar_error,{add,"sys.config",[{error,_}]}}} =
 1239: 	systools:make_tar(LatestName, [{path, P}, silent]),
 1240: 
 1241:     %% Add dummy relup and sys.config - faulty sys.config
 1242:     ok = file:write_file("sys.config","[x,y].\n"), %!!! faulty format
 1243:     ok = file:write_file("relup","{\"LATEST\",[],[]}.\n"),
 1244: 
 1245:     error = systools:make_tar(LatestName, [{path, P}]),
 1246:     {error,_,{tar_error,{add,"sys.config",[invalid_format]}}} =
 1247: 	systools:make_tar(LatestName, [{path, P}, silent]),
 1248: 
 1249:     %% Add dummy relup and sys.config - faulty relup
 1250:     ok = file:write_file("sys.config","[]\n"),
 1251:     ok = file:write_file("relup","{\"LATEST\"\n"), %!!! syntax error - truncated
 1252: 
 1253:     error = systools:make_tar(LatestName, [{path, P}]),
 1254:     {error,_,{tar_error,{add,"relup",[{error,_}]}}} =
 1255: 	systools:make_tar(LatestName, [{path, P}, silent]),
 1256: 
 1257:     %% Add dummy relup and sys.config - faulty relup
 1258:     ok = file:write_file("sys.config","[]\n"),
 1259:     ok = file:write_file("relup","[].\n"), %!!! faulty format
 1260: 
 1261:     error = systools:make_tar(LatestName, [{path, P}]),
 1262:     {error,_,{tar_error,{add,"relup",[invalid_format]}}} =
 1263: 	systools:make_tar(LatestName, [{path, P}, silent]),
 1264: 
 1265:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir),
 1266: 
 1267:     ok.
 1268:

 1272:     file:delete(filename:join(Dir,"relup")),
 1273:     ok.

 1280:     {LatestDir, LatestName} = create_script(latest,Config),
 1281: 
 1282:     DataDir = filename:absname(?copydir),

 1286: 
 1287:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir),
 1288: 
 1289:     {ok, _, []} = systools:make_script(LatestName,
 1290: 				      [silent,
 1291: 				       {path, P},
 1292: 				       {variables,[{"TEST", LibDir}]}]),
 1293: 
 1294:     ok = systools:make_tar(LatestName, [{path, P},
 1295: 					{variables,[{"TEST", LibDir}]}]),
 1296:     ok = check_var_tar("TEST", LatestName),
 1297: 
 1298:     {ok, _, []} = systools:make_tar(LatestName,
 1299: 				   [{path, P}, silent,
 1300: 				    {variables,[{"TEST", LibDir}]}]),
 1301:     ok = check_var_tar("TEST", LatestName),
 1302:

 1304:     ok.

 1306: %% make_tar: Check that symlinks in applications are handled correctly.
 1307: link_tar(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1308:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
 1309: 
 1310:     {LatestDir, LatestName} = create_script(latest,Config),
 1311: 
 1312:     DataDir = filename:absname(?copydir),
 1313:     LibDir = fname([DataDir, d_links, lib]),
 1314:     P = [fname([LibDir, 'db-2.1', ebin]),
 1315: 	 fname([LibDir, 'fe-3.1', ebin])],
 1316: 
 1317:     %% Make some links
 1318:     Db1Erl = fname(['db-2.1',src,'db1.erl']),
 1319:     NormalDb1Erl = fname([DataDir,d_normal,lib,Db1Erl]),
 1320:     LinkDb1Erl = fname([LibDir, Db1Erl]),
 1321:     ok = file:make_symlink(NormalDb1Erl, LinkDb1Erl),
 1322:     Db1Beam = fname(['db-2.1',ebin,'db1.beam']),
 1323:     NormalDb1Beam = fname([DataDir,d_normal,lib,Db1Beam]),
 1324:     LinkDb1Beam = fname([LibDir, Db1Beam]),
 1325:     ok = file:make_symlink(NormalDb1Beam, LinkDb1Beam),
 1326:     FeApp = fname(['fe-3.1',ebin,'fe.app']),
 1327:     NormalFeApp = fname([DataDir,d_normal,lib,FeApp]),
 1328:     LinkFeApp = fname([LibDir, FeApp]),
 1329:     ok = file:make_symlink(NormalFeApp, LinkFeApp),
 1330: 
 1331:     %% Create the tar and check that the linked files are included as
 1332:     %% regular files
 1333:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir),
 1334: 
 1335:     {ok,_,[]} = systools:make_script(LatestName, [{path, P},silent]),
 1336: 
 1337:     {ok, _, []} = systools:make_tar(LatestName, [{path, P}, silent]),
 1338:     ok = check_tar_regular(?privdir,
 1339: 			   [fname([lib,FeApp]),
 1340: 			    fname([lib,Db1Beam])],
 1341: 			   LatestName),
 1342: 
 1343:     {ok, _, []} = systools:make_tar(LatestName, [{path, P}, silent,
 1344: 						 {dirs, [src]}]),
 1345:     ok = check_tar_regular(?privdir,
 1346: 			   [fname([lib,FeApp]),
 1347: 			    fname([lib,Db1Beam]),
 1348: 			    fname([lib,Db1Erl])],
 1349: 			   LatestName),
 1350: 
 1351:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir),
 1352:     ok.
 1353: 
 1354: %% make_tar: Do not check date of object file or that source code can be found.
 1355: src_tests_tar(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1356:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
 1357: 
 1358:     {LatestDir, LatestName} = create_script(latest,Config),
 1359: 
 1360:     DataDir = filename:absname(?copydir),
 1361:     LibDir = fname([DataDir, d_missing_src, lib]),
 1362:     P1 = fname([LibDir, 'db-2.1', ebin]),
 1363:     P2 = fname([LibDir, 'fe-3.1', ebin]),
 1364:     P = [P1, P2],
 1365: 
 1366:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir),
 1367: 
 1368:     %% Manipulate the modification date of a beam file so it seems
 1369:     %% older than the .erl file
 1370:     Erl = filename:join([P1,"..","src","db1.erl"]),
 1371:     {ok, FileInfo=#file_info{mtime={{Y,M,D},T}}} = file:read_file_info(Erl),
 1372:     Beam = filename:join(P1,"db1.beam"),
 1373:     ok = file:write_file_info(Beam, FileInfo#file_info{mtime={{Y-1,M,D},T}}),
 1374: 
 1375:     %% Remove a .erl file
 1376:     Erl2 = filename:join([P1,"..","src","db2.erl"]),
 1377:     file:delete(Erl2),
 1378: 
 1379:     ok = systools:make_script(LatestName, [{path, P}]),
 1380: 
 1381:     %% Then make tar - two warnings should be issued when
 1382:     %% src_tests is given
 1383:     %% 1. old object code for db1.beam
 1384:     %% 2. missing source code for db2.beam
 1385:     {ok, _, [{warning,{obj_out_of_date,_}},
 1386: 	     {warning,{source_not_found,_}}]} =
 1387: 	systools:make_tar(LatestName, [{path, P}, silent,
 1388: 				       {dirs, [src]},
 1389: 				       src_tests]),
 1390:     ok = check_tar(fname([lib,'db-2.1',src,'db1.erl']), LatestName),
 1391: 
 1392:     %% Without the src_tests option, no warning should be issued
 1393:     {ok, _, []} = systools:make_tar(LatestName, [{path, P}, silent,
 1394: 						 {dirs, [src]}]),
 1395:     ok = check_tar(fname([lib,'db-2.1',src,'db1.erl']), LatestName),
 1396: 
 1397:     %% Check that the old no_module_tests option (from the time when
 1398:     %% it was default to do the src_test) is ignored
 1399:     {ok, _, [{warning,{obj_out_of_date,_}},
 1400: 	     {warning,{source_not_found,_}}]} =
 1401: 	systools:make_tar(LatestName, [{path, P}, silent,
 1402: 				       {dirs, [src]},
 1403: 				       no_module_tests,
 1404: 				       src_tests]),
 1405:     ok = check_tar(fname([lib,'db-2.1',src,'db1.erl']), LatestName),
 1406: 
 1407:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir),
 1408:     ok.
 1409: 
 1410: 
 1411: %% make_tar: Check that make_tar handles generation and placement of
 1412: %% tar files for variables outside the main tar file.
 1413: %% Test the {var_tar, include | ownfile | omit} option.
 1414: var_tar(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1415:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
 1416:     PSAVE = code:get_path(),		% Save path
 1417: 
 1418:     {LatestDir, LatestName} = create_script(latest,Config),
 1419: 
 1420:     DataDir = filename:absname(?copydir),
 1421:     LibDir = fname([DataDir, d_normal, lib]),
 1422:     P = [fname([LibDir, 'db-2.1', ebin]),
 1423: 	 fname([LibDir, 'fe-3.1', ebin])],
 1424: 
 1425:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir),
 1426: 
 1427:     {ok, _, []} = systools:make_script(LatestName,
 1428: 				      [silent,
 1429: 				       {path, P},
 1430: 				       {variables,[{"TEST", LibDir}]}]),
 1431: 
 1432:     ok = systools:make_tar(LatestName, [{path, P},
 1433: 					{var_tar, ownfile},
 1434: 					{variables,[{"TEST", LibDir}]}]),
 1435: 
 1436:     true = exists_tar_file("TEST"), %% Also removes the file !
 1437:     {error, {not_generated, _}} = check_var_tar("TEST", LatestName),
 1438: 
 1439:     ok = systools:make_tar(LatestName, [{path, P},
 1440: 					{var_tar, omit},
 1441: 					{variables,[{"TEST", LibDir}]}]),
 1442: 
 1443:     {error, {not_generated, _}} = check_var_tar("TEST", LatestName),
 1444:     false = exists_tar_file("TEST"),
 1445: 
 1446:     ok = systools:make_tar(LatestName, [{path, P},
 1447: 					{var_tar, include},
 1448: 					{variables,[{"TEST", LibDir}]}]),
 1449: 
 1450:     ok = check_var_tar("TEST", LatestName),
 1451:     false = exists_tar_file("TEST"),
 1452: 
 1453:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir),
 1454:     code:set_path(PSAVE),
 1455:     ok.
 1456:

 1458: %% make_tar: Check exref option.
 1459: exref_tar(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1460:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
 1461: 
 1462:     {LatestDir, LatestName} = create_script(latest,Config),
 1463: 
 1464:     DataDir = filename:absname(?copydir),
 1465:     LibDir = fname([DataDir, d_normal, lib]),
 1466:     P = [fname([LibDir, 'db-2.1', ebin]),
 1467: 	 fname([LibDir, 'fe-3.1', ebin])],
 1468: 
 1469:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir),
 1470: 
 1471:     {ok, _, []} = systools:make_script(LatestName, [silent, {path, P}]),
 1472: 
 1473:     %% Complete exref
 1474:     {ok, _, W1} =
 1475: 	systools:make_tar(LatestName, [exref, {path, P}, silent]),
 1476:     check_exref_warnings(with_db1, W1),
 1477:     ok = check_tar(fname([lib,'db-2.1',ebin,'db.app']), LatestName),
 1478: 
 1479:     %% Only exref the db application.
 1480:     {ok, _, W2} =
 1481: 	systools:make_tar(LatestName, [{exref, [db]}, {path, P}, silent]),
 1482:     check_exref_warnings(with_db1, W2),
 1483:     ok = check_tar(fname([lib,'fe-3.1',ebin,'fe.app']), LatestName),
 1484: 
 1485:     %% Only exref the fe application.
 1486:     {ok, _, W3} =
 1487: 	systools:make_tar(LatestName, [{exref, [fe]}, {path, P}, silent]),
 1488:     check_exref_warnings(without_db1, W3),
 1489:     ok = check_tar(fname([lib,'db-2.1',ebin,'db.app']), LatestName),
 1490: 
 1491:     %% exref the db and stdlib applications.
 1492:     {ok, _, W4} =
 1493: 	systools:make_tar(LatestName, [{exref, [db, stdlib]},
 1494: 				       {path, P}, silent]),
 1495:     check_exref_warnings(with_db1, W4),
 1496:     ok = check_tar(fname([lib,'fe-3.1',ebin,'fe.app']), LatestName),
 1497: 
 1498:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir),
 1499:     ok.

 1501: %% make_tar:  Create tar without sasl appl. Check warning.
 1502: no_sasl_tar(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1503:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
 1504: 
 1505:     {LatestDir, LatestName} = create_script(latest1_no_sasl,Config),
 1506: 
 1507:     DataDir = filename:absname(?copydir),
 1508:     LibDir = fname([DataDir, d_normal, lib]),
 1509:     P = [fname([LibDir, '*', ebin]),
 1510: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, kernel, ebin]),
 1511: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, stdlib, ebin]),
 1512: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, sasl, ebin])],
 1513: 
 1514:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir),
 1515: 
 1516:     {ok, _, _} = systools:make_script(LatestName, [silent, {path, P}]),
 1517:     ok = systools:make_tar(LatestName, [{path, P}]),
 1518:     {ok, _, [{warning,missing_sasl}]} =
 1519:         systools:make_tar(LatestName, [{path, P}, silent]),
 1520:     {ok, _, []} =
 1521:         systools:make_tar(LatestName, [{path, P}, silent, no_warn_sasl]),
 1522:     {ok, _, []} =
 1523:         systools:make_tar(LatestName, [{path, P}, silent, no_warn_sasl,
 1524:                                        warnings_as_errors]),
 1525:     TarFile = LatestName ++ ".tar.gz",
 1526:     true = filelib:is_regular(TarFile),
 1527:     ok = file:delete(TarFile),
 1528:     {error, systools_make, {warnings_treated_as_errors,[missing_sasl]}} =
 1529:         systools:make_tar(LatestName, [{path, P}, silent, warnings_as_errors]),
 1530:     error =
 1531:         systools:make_tar(LatestName, [{path, P}, warnings_as_errors]),
 1532:     false = filelib:is_regular(TarFile),
 1533: 
 1534:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir),
 1535:     ok.

 1537: %% make_tar: OTP-9507 - make_tar failed when path given as just 'ebin'.
 1538: otp_9507_path_ebin(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1539:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
 1540: 
 1541:     {LatestDir, LatestName} = create_script(latest_small,Config),
 1542: 
 1543:     DataDir = filename:absname(?copydir),
 1544:     LibDir = fname([DataDir, d_normal, lib]),
 1545:     FeDir = fname([LibDir, 'fe-3.1']),
 1546: 
 1547:     ok = file:set_cwd(FeDir),
 1548: 
 1549:     RelName = fname([LatestDir,LatestName]),
 1550: 
 1551:     P1 = ["./ebin",
 1552: 	  fname([DataDir, lib, kernel, ebin]),
 1553: 	  fname([DataDir, lib, stdlib, ebin]),
 1554: 	  fname([DataDir, lib, sasl, ebin])],
 1555:     {ok, _, []} = systools:make_script(RelName, [silent, {path, P1}]),
 1556:     ok = systools:make_tar(RelName, [{path, P1}]),
 1557:     Content1 = tar_contents(RelName),
 1558: 
 1559:     P2 = ["ebin",
 1560: 	  fname([DataDir, lib, kernel, ebin]),
 1561: 	  fname([DataDir, lib, stdlib, ebin]),
 1562: 	  fname([DataDir, lib, sasl, ebin])],
 1563: 
 1564:     %% Tickets solves the following line - it used to fail with
 1565:     %% {function_clause,[{filename,join,[[]]},...}
 1566:     ok = systools:make_tar(RelName, [{path, P2}]),
 1567:     Content2 = tar_contents(RelName),
 1568:     true = (Content1 == Content2),
 1569: 
 1570:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir),
 1571: 
 1572:     ok.

 1575: %% make_relup: Check normal case
 1576: normal_relup(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1577:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
 1578: 
 1579:     {LatestDir,LatestName}   = create_script(latest0,Config),
 1580:     {_LatestDir1,LatestName1} = create_script(latest1,Config),
 1581:     {_LatestDir2,LatestName2} = create_script(latest2,Config),
 1582: 
 1583:     DataDir = filename:absname(?copydir),
 1584:     LibDir = [fname([DataDir, d_normal, lib])],
 1585:     P = [fname([LibDir, '*', ebin]),
 1586: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, kernel, ebin]),
 1587: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, stdlib, ebin]),
 1588: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, sasl, ebin])],
 1589: 
 1590:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir),
 1591: 
 1592:     %% This is the ultra normal case
 1593:     ok = systools:make_relup(LatestName, [LatestName1], [LatestName1],
 1594: 			     [{path, P}]),
 1595:     ok = check_relup([{db, "2.1"}], [{db, "1.0"}]),
 1596:     {ok, Relup, _, []} =
 1597: 	systools:make_relup(LatestName, [LatestName1], [LatestName1],
 1598: 			    [{path, P}, silent]),
 1599:     ok = check_relup([{db, "2.1"}], [{db, "1.0"}]),
 1600: 
 1601:     %% file should not be written if warnings_as_errors is enabled.
 1602:     %% delete before running tests.
 1603:     ok = file:delete("relup"),
 1604: 
 1605:     %% Check that warnings are treated as errors
 1606:     error =
 1607: 	systools:make_relup(LatestName, [LatestName2], [LatestName1],
 1608: 			    [{path, P}, warnings_as_errors]),
 1609:     {error, systools_relup,
 1610:      {warnings_treated_as_errors,[pre_R15_emulator_upgrade,
 1611:                                   {erts_vsn_changed, _}]}} =
 1612: 	systools:make_relup(LatestName, [LatestName2], [LatestName1],
 1613: 			    [{path, P}, silent, warnings_as_errors]),
 1614: 
 1615:     %% relup file should not exist
 1616:     false = filelib:is_regular("relup"),
 1617: 
 1618:     %% Check that warnings get through
 1619:     ok = systools:make_relup(LatestName, [LatestName2], [LatestName1],
 1620: 			     [{path, P}]),
 1621:     ok = check_relup([{fe, "3.1"}, {db, "2.1"}], [{db, "1.0"}]),
 1622:     {ok, _, _, [pre_R15_emulator_upgrade,{erts_vsn_changed, _}]} =
 1623: 	systools:make_relup(LatestName, [LatestName2], [LatestName1],
 1624: 			    [{path, P}, silent]),
 1625:     ok = check_relup([{fe, "3.1"}, {db, "2.1"}], [{db, "1.0"}]),
 1626: 
 1627:     %% relup file should exist now
 1628:     true = filelib:is_regular("relup"),
 1629: 
 1630:     %% file should not be written if noexec option is used.
 1631:     %% delete before running tests.
 1632:     ok = file:delete("relup"),
 1633:     {ok,Relup,_,[]} =
 1634:         systools:make_relup(LatestName, [LatestName1], [LatestName1],
 1635:                             [{path, P}, noexec]),
 1636:     false = filelib:is_regular("relup"),
 1637: 
 1638:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir),
 1639:     ok.
 1640: 
 1641: 
 1642: %% make_relup: Test relup which includes emulator restart.
 1643: restart_relup(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1644:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
 1645: 
 1646:     {LatestDir,LatestName}   = create_script(latest0,Config),
 1647:     {_LatestDir1,LatestName1} = create_script(latest1,Config),
 1648:     {_LatestDir0CurrErts,LatestName0CurrErts} =
 1649: 	create_script(latest0_current_erts,Config),
 1650:     {_CurrentAllDir,CurrentAllName} = create_script(current_all,Config),
 1651:     {_CurrentAllFutErtsDir,CurrentAllFutErtsName} =
 1652: 	create_script(current_all_future_erts,Config),
 1653:     {_CurrentAllFutSaslDir,CurrentAllFutSaslName} =
 1654: 	create_script(current_all_future_sasl,Config),
 1655: 
 1656:     DataDir = filename:absname(?copydir),
 1657:     LibDir = [fname([DataDir, d_normal, lib])],
 1658:     P = [fname([LibDir, '*', ebin]),
 1659: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, kernel, ebin]),
 1660: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, stdlib, ebin]),
 1661: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, sasl, ebin]),
 1662: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, 'sasl-9.9', ebin])],
 1663: 
 1664:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir),
 1665: 
 1666:     %% OTP-2561: Check that the option 'restart_emulator' generates a
 1667:     %% "restart_emulator" instruction.
 1668:     {ok, _ , _, []} =
 1669: 	systools:make_relup(LatestName, [LatestName1], [LatestName1],
 1670: 			    [{path, P},restart_emulator,silent]),
 1671:     ok = check_relup([{db, "2.1"}], [{db, "1.0"}]),
 1672:     ok = check_restart_emulator(),
 1673: 
 1674: 
 1675:     %% Pre-R15 to Post-R15 upgrade
 1676:     {ok, _ , _, Ws} =
 1677: 	systools:make_relup(LatestName0CurrErts,
 1678: 			    [LatestName1],
 1679: 			    [LatestName1],
 1680: 			    [{path, P},silent]),
 1681:     ok = check_relup([{db,"2.1"}], [{db, "1.0"}]),
 1682:     ok = check_pre_to_post_r15_restart_emulator(),
 1683:     ok = check_pre_to_post_r15_warnings(Ws),
 1684: 
 1685: 
 1686:     %% Check that new sasl version generates a restart_new_emulator
 1687:     %% instruction
 1688:     {ok, _ , _, []} =
 1689: 	systools:make_relup(CurrentAllFutSaslName,
 1690: 			    [CurrentAllName],
 1691: 			    [CurrentAllName],
 1692: 			    [{path, P},silent]),
 1693:     ok = check_relup([{fe, "3.1"}], []),
 1694:     ok = check_restart_emulator_diff_coreapp(),
 1695: 
 1696: 
 1697:     %% Check that new erts version generates a restart_new_emulator
 1698:     %% instruction, if FromSaslVsn >= R15SaslVsn
 1699:     %% (One erts_vsn_changed warning for upgrade and one for downgrade)
 1700:     {ok, _ , _, [{erts_vsn_changed,_},{erts_vsn_changed,_}]} =
 1701: 	systools:make_relup(CurrentAllFutErtsName,
 1702: 			    [CurrentAllName],
 1703: 			    [CurrentAllName],
 1704: 			    [{path, P},silent]),
 1705:     ok = check_relup([{fe, "3.1"}], []),
 1706:     ok = check_restart_emulator_diff_coreapp(),
 1707: 
 1708: 
 1709:     %% Check that new erts version generates a restart_new_emulator
 1710:     %% instruction, and can be combined with restart_emulator opt.
 1711:     %% (One erts_vsn_changed warning for upgrade and one for downgrade)
 1712:     {ok, _ , _, [{erts_vsn_changed,_},{erts_vsn_changed,_}]} =
 1713: 	systools:make_relup(CurrentAllFutErtsName,
 1714: 			    [CurrentAllName],
 1715: 			    [CurrentAllName],
 1716: 			    [{path, P},restart_emulator,silent]),
 1717:     ok = check_relup([{fe, "3.1"}], []),
 1718:     ok = check_restart_emulator(),
 1719:     ok = check_restart_emulator_diff_coreapp(),
 1720: 
 1721:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir),
 1722:     ok.
 1723: 
 1724: 
 1725: %% This test fails if wrong version numbers are seen in the relup file
 1726: %% or if any application is missing. This was triggered by OTP-1360.
 1727: check_relup(UpVsnL, DnVsnL) ->
 1728:     {ok, [{_V1, [{_, _, Up}], [{_, _, Dn}]}]} = file:consult(relup),
 1729:     [] = foldl(fun(X, Acc) ->
 1730: 		       true = lists:member(X, Acc),
 1731: 		       lists:delete(X, Acc) end,
 1732: 	       UpVsnL,
 1733: 	       [{App, Vsn} || {load_object_code,{App,Vsn,_}} <- Up]),
 1734:     [] = foldl(fun(X, Acc) ->
 1735: 		       true = lists:member(X, Acc),
 1736: 		       lists:delete(X, Acc) end,
 1737: 	       DnVsnL,
 1738: 	       [{App, Vsn} || {load_object_code,{App,Vsn,_}} <- Dn]),
 1739:     ok.
 1740: 
 1741: check_relup_up_only(UpVsnL) ->
 1742:     {ok, [{_V1, [{_, _, Up}], []}]} = file:consult(relup),
 1743:     [] = foldl(fun(X, Acc) ->
 1744: 		       true = lists:member(X, Acc),
 1745: 		       lists:delete(X, Acc) end,
 1746: 	       UpVsnL,
 1747: 	       [{App, Vsn} || {load_object_code,{App,Vsn,_}} <- Up]),
 1748:     ok.
 1749: 
 1750: check_restart_emulator() ->
 1751:     {ok, [{_V1, [{_, _, Up}], [{_, _, Dn}]}]} = file:consult(relup),
 1752:     restart_emulator = lists:last(Up),
 1753:     restart_emulator = lists:last(Dn),
 1754:     ok.
 1755: 
 1756: check_restart_emulator_up_only() ->
 1757:     {ok, [{_V1, [{_, _, Up}], []}]} = file:consult(relup),
 1758:     restart_emulator = lists:last(Up),
 1759:     ok.
 1760: 
 1761: check_restart_emulator_diff_coreapp() ->
 1762:     {ok, [{_V1, [{_, _, Up}], [{_, _, Dn}]}]} = file:consult(relup),
 1763:     [restart_new_emulator|_] = Up,
 1764:     restart_emulator = lists:last(Dn),
 1765:     ok.
 1766: 
 1767: check_pre_to_post_r15_restart_emulator() ->
 1768:     {ok, [{_V1, [{_, _, Up}], [{_, _, Dn}]}]} = file:consult(relup),
 1769:     restart_new_emulator = lists:last(Up),
 1770:     restart_emulator = lists:last(Dn),
 1771:     ok.
 1772: 
 1773: check_pre_to_post_r15_warnings(Ws) ->
 1774:     true = lists:member(pre_R15_emulator_upgrade,Ws),
 1775:     ok.
 1776: 
 1777: %% make_relup: Check that appup files may be missing, but only if we
 1778: %% don't need them.
 1779: no_appup_relup(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1780:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
 1781: 
 1782:     {LatestDir,LatestName}   = create_script(latest_small,Config),
 1783:     {_LatestDir0,LatestName0} = create_script(latest_small0,Config),
 1784:     {_LatestDir1,LatestName1} = create_script(latest_small1,Config),
 1785: 
 1786:     DataDir = filename:absname(?copydir),
 1787: 
 1788:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir),
 1789: 
 1790:     %% Check that appup might be missing
 1791:     P1 = [fname([DataDir, d_no_appup, lib, 'fe-3.1', ebin]),
 1792: 	  fname([DataDir, lib, kernel, ebin]),
 1793: 	  fname([DataDir, lib, stdlib, ebin]),
 1794: 	  fname([DataDir, lib, sasl, ebin])],
 1795:     ok =
 1796: 	systools:make_relup(LatestName, [LatestName], [], [{path, P1}]),
 1797:     {ok,_, _, []} =
 1798: 	systools:make_relup(LatestName, [LatestName], [],
 1799: 			    [silent, {path, P1}]),
 1800: 
 1801:     %% Check that appup might NOT be missing when we need it
 1802:     P2 = [fname([DataDir, d_no_appup, lib, 'fe-3.1', ebin]),
 1803: 	  fname([DataDir, d_no_appup, lib, 'fe-2.1', ebin]),
 1804: 	  fname([DataDir, lib, kernel, ebin]),
 1805: 	  fname([DataDir, lib, stdlib, ebin]),
 1806: 	  fname([DataDir, lib, sasl, ebin])],
 1807:     error =
 1808: 	systools:make_relup(LatestName, [LatestName0], [], [{path, P2}]),
 1809:     {error,_,{file_problem, {_,{error,{open,_,_}}}}} =
 1810: 	systools:make_relup(LatestName, [], [LatestName0],
 1811: 			    [silent, {path, P2}]),
 1812: 
 1813:     %% Check that appups missing vsn traps
 1814:     P3 = [fname([DataDir, d_no_appup, lib, 'fe-2.1', ebin]),
 1815: 	  fname([DataDir, d_no_appup, lib, 'fe-500.18.7', ebin]),
 1816: 	  fname([DataDir, lib, kernel, ebin]),
 1817: 	  fname([DataDir, lib, stdlib, ebin]),
 1818: 	  fname([DataDir, lib, sasl, ebin])],
 1819: 
 1820:     error =
 1821: 	systools:make_relup(LatestName0, [LatestName1], [], [{path, P3}]),
 1822:     {error,_,{no_relup, _, _, _}} =
 1823: 	systools:make_relup(LatestName0, [], [LatestName1],
 1824: 			    [silent, {path, P3}]),
 1825: 
 1826:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir),
 1827:     ok.

 1829: %% make_relup: Check that badly written appup files are detected.

 1831:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
 1832: 
 1833:     {LatestDir,LatestName}   = create_script(latest_small,Config),
 1834:     {_LatestDir0,LatestName0} = create_script(latest_small0,Config),
 1835: 
 1836:     DataDir = filename:absname(?copydir),
 1837:     N2 = [fname([DataDir, d_bad_appup, lib, 'fe-3.1', ebin]),
 1838: 	  fname([DataDir, d_bad_appup, lib, 'fe-2.1', ebin]),
 1839: 	  fname([DataDir, lib, kernel, ebin]),
 1840: 	  fname([DataDir, lib, stdlib, ebin]),
 1841: 	  fname([DataDir, lib, sasl, ebin])],
 1842: 
 1843:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir),
 1844: 
 1845:     %% Check that bad appup is trapped
 1846:     error =
 1847: 	systools:make_relup(LatestName, [LatestName0], [], [{path, N2}]),
 1848:     {error,_,{file_problem, {_, {error, {parse,_, _}}}}} =
 1849: 	systools:make_relup(LatestName, [], [LatestName0],
 1850: 			    [silent, {path, N2}]),
 1851:

 1853:     ok.

 1855: %% make_relup: Check some abnormal cases.
 1856: abnormal_relup(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1857:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
 1858: 
 1859:     {LatestDir,LatestName}   = create_script(latest0,Config),
 1860:     {_LatestDir1,LatestName1} = create_script(latest1,Config),
 1861: 
 1862:     %% Check wrong app vsn
 1863:     DataDir = filename:absname(?copydir),
 1864:     P = [fname([DataDir, d_bad_app_vsn, lib, 'db-2.1', ebin]),
 1865: 	 fname([DataDir, d_bad_app_vsn, lib, 'fe-3.1', ebin]),
 1866: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, kernel, ebin]),
 1867: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, stdlib, ebin]),
 1868: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, sasl, ebin])],
 1869: 
 1870:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir),
 1871: 
 1872:     error = systools:make_relup(LatestName, [LatestName1], [LatestName1],
 1873: 				[{path, P}]),
 1874:     R0 = systools:make_relup(LatestName, [LatestName1], [LatestName1],
 1875: 			     [silent, {path, P}]),
 1876:     {error,systools_make,
 1877:      [{error_reading,{db,{no_valid_version,
 1878: 			  {{"should be","2.1"},
 1879: 			   {"found file", _, "2.0"}}}}}]} = R0,
 1880:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir),
 1881:     ok.
