 1884: %% make_relup: Check relup cannot be created is sasl is not in rel file.
 1885: no_sasl_relup(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1886:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
 1887:     {Dir1,Name1} = create_script(latest1_no_sasl,Config),
 1888:     {_Dir2,Name2} = create_script(latest1,Config),
 1889: 
 1890:     DataDir = filename:absname(?copydir),
 1891:     LibDir = [fname([DataDir, d_normal, lib])],
 1892:     P = [fname([LibDir, '*', ebin]),
 1893: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, kernel, ebin]),
 1894: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, stdlib, ebin]),
 1895: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, sasl, ebin])],
 1896: 
 1897:     ok = file:set_cwd(Dir1),
 1898: 
 1899:     error = systools:make_relup(Name2, [Name1], [Name1], [{path, P}]),
 1900:     R1 = systools:make_relup(Name2, [Name1], [Name1],[silent, {path, P}]),
 1901:     {error,systools_relup,{missing_sasl,_}} = R1,
 1902: 
 1903:     error = systools:make_relup(Name1, [Name2], [Name2], [{path, P}]),
 1904:     R2 = systools:make_relup(Name1, [Name2], [Name2],[silent, {path, P}]),
 1905:     {error,systools_relup,{missing_sasl,_}} = R2,
 1906: 
 1907:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir),
 1908:     ok.
 1909: 
 1910: 
 1911: %% make_relup: Check that application start type is used in relup
 1912: app_start_type_relup(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1913:     %% This might fail if some applications are not available, if so
 1914:     %% skip the test case.
 1915:     try create_script(latest_app_start_type2,Config) of
 1916: 	{Dir2,Name2} ->
 1917: 	    app_start_type_relup(Dir2,Name2,Config)
 1918:     catch throw:{error,Reason} ->
 1919: 	    {skip,Reason}
 1920:     end.
 1921: 
 1922: app_start_type_relup(Dir2,Name2,Config) ->
 1923:     PrivDir = ?config(priv_dir, Config),
 1924:     {Dir1,Name1} = create_script(latest_app_start_type1,Config),
 1925: 
 1926:     Release1 = filename:join(Dir1,Name1),
 1927:     Release2 = filename:join(Dir2,Name2),
 1928: 
 1929:     {ok, Release2Relup, systools_relup, []} = systools:make_relup(Release2, [Release1], [Release1], [{outdir, PrivDir}, silent]),
 1930:     {"LATEST_APP_START_TYPE2",
 1931:      [{"LATEST_APP_START_TYPE1",[], UpInstructions}],
 1932:      [{"LATEST_APP_START_TYPE1",[], DownInstructions}]} = Release2Relup,
 1933:     %% test_server:format("Up: ~p",[UpInstructions]),
 1934:     %% test_server:format("Dn: ~p",[DownInstructions]),
 1935:     [{load_object_code, {mnesia, _, _}},
 1936:      {load_object_code, {runtime_tools, _, _}},
 1937:      {load_object_code, {snmp, _, _}},
 1938:      {load_object_code, {xmerl, _, _}},
 1939:      point_of_no_return
 1940:      | UpInstructionsT] = UpInstructions,
 1941:     true = lists:member({apply,{application,start,[mnesia,permanent]}}, UpInstructionsT),
 1942:     true = lists:member({apply,{application,start,[runtime_tools,transient]}}, UpInstructionsT),
 1943:     true = lists:member({apply,{application,load,[snmp]}}, UpInstructionsT),
 1944:     false = lists:any(fun({apply,{application,_,[xmerl|_]}}) -> true; (_) -> false end, UpInstructionsT),
 1945:     [point_of_no_return | DownInstructionsT] = DownInstructions,
 1946:     true = lists:member({apply,{application,stop,[mnesia]}}, DownInstructionsT),
 1947:     true = lists:member({apply,{application,stop,[runtime_tools]}}, DownInstructionsT),
 1948:     true = lists:member({apply,{application,stop,[snmp]}}, DownInstructionsT),
 1949:     true = lists:member({apply,{application,stop,[xmerl]}}, DownInstructionsT),
 1950:     true = lists:member({apply,{application,unload,[mnesia]}}, DownInstructionsT),
 1951:     true = lists:member({apply,{application,unload,[runtime_tools]}}, DownInstructionsT),
 1952:     true = lists:member({apply,{application,unload,[snmp]}}, DownInstructionsT),
 1953:     true = lists:member({apply,{application,unload,[xmerl]}}, DownInstructionsT),
 1954:     ok.
 1955: 
 1956: 
 1957: %% make_relup: Check that regexp can be used in .appup for UpFromVsn
 1958: %% and DownToVsn.
 1959: regexp_relup(Config) ->
 1960:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
 1961: 
 1962:     {LatestDir,LatestName}   = create_script(latest_small,Config),
 1963:     {_LatestDir0,LatestName0} = create_script(latest_small0,Config),
 1964:     {_LatestDir1,LatestName1} = create_script(latest_small2,Config),
 1965: 
 1966:     DataDir = filename:absname(?copydir),
 1967:     P = [fname([DataDir, d_regexp_appup, lib, '*', ebin]),
 1968: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, kernel, ebin]),
 1969: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, stdlib, ebin]),
 1970: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, sasl, ebin])],
 1971: 
 1972:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir),
 1973: 
 1974:     %% Upgrade fe 2.1 -> 3.1, and downgrade 2.1 -> 3.1
 1975:     %% Shall match the first entry if fe-3.1 appup.
 1976:     {ok, _, _, []} =
 1977: 	systools:make_relup(LatestName, [LatestName0], [LatestName0],
 1978: 			    [{path, P}, silent]),
 1979:     ok = check_relup([{fe, "3.1"}], [{fe, "2.1"}]),
 1980: 
 1981:     %% Upgrade fe 2.1.1 -> 3.1
 1982:     %% Shall match the second entry in fe-3.1 appup. Have added a
 1983:     %% restart_emulator instruction there to distinguish it from
 1984:     %% the first entry...
 1985:     {ok, _, _, []} =
 1986: 	systools:make_relup(LatestName, [LatestName1], [], [{path, P}, silent]),
 1987:     ok = check_relup_up_only([{fe, "3.1"}]),
 1988:     ok = check_restart_emulator_up_only(),
 1989: 
 1990:     %% Attempt downgrade fe 3.1 -> 2.1.1
 1991:     %% Shall not match any entry!!
 1992:     {error,systools_relup,{no_relup,_,_,_}} =
 1993: 	systools:make_relup(LatestName, [], [LatestName1], [{path, P}, silent]),
 1994: 
 1995:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir),
 1996: 
 1997:     ok.
 1998: 
 1999: %% make_relup: Replace an application dependency with another
 2000: %%   The key part here is that the new application should be
 2001: %%   started before the old one is stopped.
 2002: replace_app_relup(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2003:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
 2004: 
 2005:     {LatestDir,LatestName}   = create_script(replace_app0,Config),
 2006:     {_LatestDir1,LatestName1} = create_script(replace_app1,Config),
 2007: 
 2008:     DataDir = filename:absname(?copydir),
 2009:     LibDir = [fname([DataDir, d_replace_app, lib])],
 2010:     P = [fname([LibDir, '*', ebin]),
 2011: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, kernel, ebin]),
 2012: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, stdlib, ebin]),
 2013: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, sasl, ebin])],
 2014: 
 2015:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir),
 2016:     
 2017:     ok = systools:make_relup(LatestName, [LatestName1], [LatestName1],
 2018: 			     [{path, P}]),
 2019: 
 2020:     check_start_stop_order([{start,gh},{stop,fe}], [{start,fe},{stop,gh}]),
 2021: 
 2022:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir),
 2023:     ok.
 2024: 
 2025: 
 2026: check_start_stop_order(UpOrder, DownOrder) ->
 2027: 
 2028:     {ok, [{_V0, [{V1, [], Up}],
 2029:                 [{V1, [], Down}]
 2030:             }]} = file:consult(relup),
 2031: 
 2032:     GetAppStartStop = fun(Instr) ->
 2033:         [{Action,App} || {apply,{application,Action,[App|_]}} <- Instr,
 2034:                 lists:member(Action,[start,stop])]
 2035:     end,
 2036: 
 2037:     case GetAppStartStop(Up) of
 2038:         UpOrder -> ok;
 2039:         ActualUpOrder ->
 2040:           ct:fail("Incorrect upgrade order.~nExpected: ~p~nGot:~p",
 2041:                   [UpOrder,ActualUpOrder])
 2042:     end,
 2043: 
 2044:     case GetAppStartStop(Down) of
 2045:         DownOrder -> ok;
 2046:         ActualDownOrder ->
 2047:           ct:fail("Incorrect down order.~nExpected: ~p~nGot:~p",
 2048:                   [DownOrder,ActualDownOrder])
 2049:     end,
 2050: 
 2051:     ok.
 2052: 
 2053: %% make_hybrid_boot: Normal case.
 2054: %% For upgrade of erts - create a boot file which is a hybrid between
 2055: %% old and new release - i.e. starts erts, kernel, stdlib, sasl from
 2056: %% new release, all other apps from old release.
 2057: normal_hybrid(Config) ->
 2058:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
 2059:     {Dir1,Name1} = create_script(latest1,Config),
 2060:     {_Dir2,Name2} = create_script(current_all,Config),
 2061: 
 2062:     DataDir = filename:absname(?copydir),
 2063:     LibDir = [fname([DataDir, d_normal, lib])],
 2064:     P = [fname([LibDir, '*', ebin]),
 2065: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, kernel, ebin]),
 2066: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, stdlib, ebin]),
 2067: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, sasl, ebin])],
 2068: 
 2069:     ok = file:set_cwd(Dir1),
 2070: 
 2071:     {ok, _ , []} = systools:make_script(Name1,[{path, P},silent]),
 2072:     {ok, _ , []} = systools:make_script(Name2,[{path, P},silent]),
 2073:     {ok,Boot1} = file:read_file(Name1 ++ ".boot"),
 2074:     {ok,Boot2} = file:read_file(Name2 ++ ".boot"),
 2075: 
 2076:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir),
 2077: 
 2078:     {ok,Hybrid} = systools_make:make_hybrid_boot("tmp_vsn",Boot1,Boot2,
 2079:                                                  [dummy,args]),
 2080: 
 2081:     {script,{"Test release","tmp_vsn"},Script} = binary_to_term(Hybrid),
 2082:     ct:log("~p.~n",[Script]),
 2083: 
 2084:     %% Check that all paths to base apps are replaced by paths from BaseLib
 2085:     Boot1Str = io_lib:format("~p~n",[binary_to_term(Boot1)]),
 2086:     Boot2Str = io_lib:format("~p~n",[binary_to_term(Boot2)]),
 2087:     HybridStr = io_lib:format("~p~n",[binary_to_term(Hybrid)]),
 2088:     ReOpts = [global,{capture,first,list},unicode],
 2089:     {match,OldKernelMatch} = re:run(Boot1Str,"kernel-[0-9\.]+",ReOpts),
 2090:     {match,OldStdlibMatch} = re:run(Boot1Str,"stdlib-[0-9\.]+",ReOpts),
 2091:     {match,OldSaslMatch} = re:run(Boot1Str,"sasl-[0-9\.]+",ReOpts),
 2092: 
 2093:     {match,NewKernelMatch} = re:run(Boot2Str,"kernel-[0-9\.]+",ReOpts),
 2094:     {match,NewStdlibMatch} = re:run(Boot2Str,"stdlib-[0-9\.]+",ReOpts),
 2095:     {match,NewSaslMatch} = re:run(Boot2Str,"sasl-[0-9\.]+",ReOpts),
 2096: 
 2097:     {match,NewKernelMatch} = re:run(HybridStr,"kernel-[0-9\.]+",ReOpts),
 2098:     {match,NewStdlibMatch} = re:run(HybridStr,"stdlib-[0-9\.]+",ReOpts),
 2099:     {match,NewSaslMatch} = re:run(HybridStr,"sasl-[0-9\.]+",ReOpts),
 2100: 
 2101:     NewKernelN = length(NewKernelMatch),
 2102:     NewKernelN = length(OldKernelMatch),
 2103:     NewStdlibN = length(NewStdlibMatch),
 2104:     NewStdlibN = length(OldStdlibMatch),
 2105:     NewSaslN = length(NewSaslMatch),
 2106:     NewSaslN = length(OldSaslMatch),
 2107: 
 2108:     %% Check that kernelProcesses are taken from new boot script
 2109:     {script,_,Script2} = binary_to_term(Boot2),
 2110:     NewKernelProcs = [KP || KP={kernelProcess,_,_} <- Script2],
 2111:     NewKernelProcs = [KP || KP={kernelProcess,_,_} <- Script],
 2112: 
 2113:     %% Check that application load instruction has correct versions
 2114:     Apps = application:loaded_applications(),
 2115:     {_,_,KernelVsn} = lists:keyfind(kernel,1,Apps),
 2116:     {_,_,StdlibVsn} = lists:keyfind(stdlib,1,Apps),
 2117:     {_,_,SaslVsn} = lists:keyfind(sasl,1,Apps),
 2118: 
 2119:     [KernelInfo] = [I || {kernelProcess,application_controller,
 2120: 			  {application_controller,start,
 2121: 			   [{application,kernel,I}]}} <- Script],
 2122:     [StdlibInfo] = [I || {apply,
 2123: 			  {application,load,
 2124: 			   [{application,stdlib,I}]}} <- Script],
 2125:     [SaslInfo] = [I || {apply,
 2126: 			{application,load,
 2127: 			 [{application,sasl,I}]}} <- Script],
 2128: 
 2129:     {vsn,KernelVsn} = lists:keyfind(vsn,1,KernelInfo),
 2130:     {vsn,StdlibVsn} = lists:keyfind(vsn,1,StdlibInfo),
 2131:     {vsn,SaslVsn} = lists:keyfind(vsn,1,SaslInfo),
 2132: 
 2133:     %% Check that new_emulator_upgrade call is added
 2134:     [_,{apply,{release_handler,new_emulator_upgrade,[dummy,args]}}|_] =
 2135: 	lists:reverse(Script),
 2136: 
 2137:     %% Check that db-1.0 and fe-3.1 are used (i.e. vsns from old release)
 2138:     %% And that fe is in there (it exists in old rel but not in new)
 2139:     {match,DbMatch} = re:run(HybridStr,"db-[0-9\.]+",ReOpts),
 2140:     {match,[_|_]=FeMatch} = re:run(HybridStr,"fe-[0-9\.]+",ReOpts),
 2141:     true = lists:all(fun(["db-1.0"]) -> true;
 2142: 			(_)  -> false
 2143: 		     end,
 2144: 		     DbMatch),
 2145:     true = lists:all(fun(["fe-3.1"]) -> true;
 2146: 			(_)  -> false
 2147: 		     end,
 2148: 		     FeMatch),
 2149: 
 2150:     %% Check that script has same length as old script, plus one (the
 2151:     %% new_emulator_upgrade apply)
 2152:     {_,_,Old} = binary_to_term(Boot1),
 2153:     OldLength = length(Old),
 2154:     NewLength = length(Script),
 2155:     NewLength = OldLength + 1,
 2156: 
 2157:     ok.
 2158: 
 2159: %% make_hybrid_boot: No sasl in from-release.
 2160: %% Check that systools_make:make_hybrid_boot fails with a meaningful
 2161: %% error message if the FromBoot does not include the sasl
 2162: %% application.
 2163: hybrid_no_old_sasl(Config) ->
 2164:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
 2165:     {Dir1,Name1} = create_script(latest1_no_sasl,Config),
 2166:     {_Dir2,Name2} = create_script(current_all,Config),
 2167: 
 2168:     DataDir = filename:absname(?copydir),
 2169:     LibDir = [fname([DataDir, d_normal, lib])],
 2170:     P = [fname([LibDir, '*', ebin]),
 2171: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, kernel, ebin]),
 2172: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, stdlib, ebin]),
 2173: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, sasl, ebin])],
 2174: 
 2175:     ok = file:set_cwd(Dir1),
 2176: 
 2177:     {ok, _ , [{warning,missing_sasl}]} =
 2178: 	systools:make_script(Name1,[{path, P},silent]),
 2179:     {ok, _ , []} = systools:make_script(Name2,[{path, P},silent]),
 2180:     {ok,Boot1} = file:read_file(Name1 ++ ".boot"),
 2181:     {ok,Boot2} = file:read_file(Name2 ++ ".boot"),
 2182: 
 2183:     {error,{app_not_replaced,sasl}} =
 2184: 	systools_make:make_hybrid_boot("tmp_vsn",Boot1,Boot2,[dummy,args]),
 2185: 
 2186:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir),
 2187:     ok.
 2188: 
 2189: 
 2190: %% make_hybrid_boot: No sasl in to-release.
 2191: %% Check that systools_make:make_hybrid_boot fails with a meaningful
 2192: %% error message if the ToBoot does not include the sasl
 2193: %% application.
 2194: hybrid_no_new_sasl(Config) ->
 2195:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
 2196:     {Dir1,Name1} = create_script(latest1,Config),
 2197:     {_Dir2,Name2} = create_script(current_all_no_sasl,Config),
 2198: 
 2199:     DataDir = filename:absname(?copydir),
 2200:     LibDir = [fname([DataDir, d_normal, lib])],
 2201:     P = [fname([LibDir, '*', ebin]),
 2202: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, kernel, ebin]),
 2203: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, stdlib, ebin]),
 2204: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, sasl, ebin])],
 2205: 
 2206:     ok = file:set_cwd(Dir1),
 2207: 
 2208:     {ok, _ , []} = systools:make_script(Name1,[{path, P},silent]),
 2209:     {ok, _ , [{warning,missing_sasl}]} =
 2210: 	systools:make_script(Name2,[{path, P},silent]),
 2211:     {ok,Boot1} = file:read_file(Name1 ++ ".boot"),
 2212:     {ok,Boot2} = file:read_file(Name2 ++ ".boot"),
 2213: 
 2214:     {error,{app_not_found,sasl}} =
 2215: 	systools_make:make_hybrid_boot("tmp_vsn",Boot1,Boot2,[dummy,args]),
 2216: 
 2217:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir),
 2218:     ok.
 2219: 
 2220: 
 2221: 
 2222: %% options: {outdir,Dir} option
 2223: otp_6226_outdir(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2224:     PrivDir = ?privdir,
 2225:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
 2226: 
 2227:     {LatestDir, LatestName} = create_script(latest0,Config),
 2228:     {_LatestDir, LatestName1} = create_script(latest1,Config),
 2229: 
 2230:     DataDir = filename:absname(?copydir),
 2231:     LibDir = fname([DataDir, d_normal, lib]),
 2232:     P = [fname([LibDir, 'db-2.1', ebin]),
 2233: 	 fname([LibDir, 'db-1.0', ebin]),
 2234: 	 fname([LibDir, 'fe-3.1', ebin]),
 2235: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, kernel, ebin]),
 2236: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, stdlib, ebin]),
 2237: 	 fname([DataDir, lib, sasl, ebin])],
 2238: 
 2239:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir),
 2240: 
 2241: 
 2242:     %% Create an outdir1 directory
 2243:     ok = file:make_dir("outdir1"),
 2244: 
 2245:     %% ==== Now test systools:make_script ====
 2246:     %% a) badarg
 2247:     {'EXIT', {{badarg,[{outdir,outdir1}]}, _}} =
 2248: 	(catch systools:make_script(LatestName, [{outdir,outdir1},
 2249: 						 {path,P},silent])),
 2250: 
 2251:     %% b) absolute path
 2252:     Outdir1 = filename:join(PrivDir, "outdir1"),
 2253:     {ok,_,[]} = systools:make_script(LatestName, [{outdir,Outdir1},
 2254: 						  {path,P},silent]),
 2255:     Script1 = filename:join(Outdir1, LatestName ++ ".script"),
 2256:     Boot1 = filename:join(Outdir1, LatestName ++ ".boot"),
 2257:     true = filelib:is_file(Script1),
 2258:     true = filelib:is_file(Boot1),
 2259:     ok = file:delete(Script1),
 2260:     ok = file:delete(Boot1),
 2261: 
 2262:     %% c) relative path
 2263:     {ok,_,[]} = systools:make_script(LatestName, [{outdir,"./outdir1"},
 2264: 						  {path,P},silent]),
 2265:     true = filelib:is_file(Script1),
 2266:     true = filelib:is_file(Boot1),
 2267:     ok = file:delete(Script1),
 2268:     ok = file:delete(Boot1),
 2269: 
 2270:     %% d) absolute but incorrect path
 2271:     Outdir2 = filename:join(PrivDir, "outdir2"),
 2272:     Script2 = filename:join(Outdir2, LatestName ++ ".script"),
 2273:     {error,_,{open,Script2,_}} =
 2274: 	systools:make_script(LatestName, [{outdir,Outdir2},{path,P},silent]),
 2275: 
 2276:     %% e) relative but incorrect path
 2277:     {error,_,{open,_,_}} =
 2278: 	systools:make_script(LatestName, [{outdir,"./outdir2"},{path,P},silent]),
 2279: 
 2280:     %% f) with .rel in another directory than cwd
 2281:     ok = file:set_cwd(Outdir1),
 2282:     {ok,_,[]} = systools:make_script(filename:join(PrivDir, LatestName),
 2283: 				     [{outdir,"."},{path,P},silent]),
 2284:     true = filelib:is_file(LatestName ++ ".script"),
 2285:     true = filelib:is_file(LatestName ++ ".boot"),
 2286:     ok = file:delete(LatestName ++ ".script"),
 2287:     ok = file:delete(LatestName ++ ".boot"),
 2288:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir),
 2289: 
 2290:     %% ==== Now test systools:make_tar =====
 2291:     {ok,_,[]} = systools:make_script(LatestName, [{path,P},silent]),
 2292:     %% a) badarg
 2293:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, [{outdir,outdir1}]}, _}} =
 2294:     	(catch systools:make_tar(LatestName,[{outdir,outdir1},{path,P},silent])),
 2295: 
 2296:     %% b) absolute path
 2297:     {ok,_,[]} = systools:make_tar(LatestName, [{outdir,Outdir1},
 2298: 					       {path,P},silent]),
 2299:     Tar1 = filename:join(Outdir1,LatestName++".tar.gz"),
 2300:     true = filelib:is_file(Tar1),
 2301:     ok = file:delete(Tar1),
 2302: 
 2303:     %% c) relative path
 2304:     {ok,_,[]} = systools:make_tar(LatestName, [{outdir,"./outdir1"},
 2305: 					       {path,P},silent]),
 2306:     true = filelib:is_file(Tar1),
 2307:     ok = file:delete(Tar1),
 2308: 
 2309:     %% d) absolute but incorrect path
 2310:     Tar2 = filename:join(Outdir2,LatestName++".tar.gz"),
 2311:     {error,_,{tar_error,{open,Tar2,{Tar2,enoent}}}} =
 2312: 	systools:make_tar(LatestName, [{outdir,Outdir2},{path,P},silent]),
 2313: 
 2314:     %% e) relative but incorrect path
 2315:     {error,_,{tar_error,{open,_,_}}} =
 2316: 	systools:make_tar(LatestName, [{outdir,"./outdir2"},{path,P},silent]),
 2317: 
 2318:     %% f) with .rel in another directory than cwd
 2319:     ok = file:set_cwd(Outdir1),
 2320:     {ok,_,[]} = systools:make_tar(filename:join(PrivDir, LatestName),
 2321: 				  [{outdir,"."},{path,P},silent]),
 2322:     true = filelib:is_file(Tar1),
 2323:     ok = file:set_cwd(LatestDir),
 2324: 
 2325:     %% ===== Now test systools:make_relup =====
 2326:     %% a) badarg
 2327:     {'EXIT', {{badarg, [{outdir,outdir1}]}, _}} =
 2328:     	(catch systools:make_relup(LatestName,[LatestName1],[LatestName1],
 2329:     				   [{outdir,outdir1}, 
 2330: 				    {path,P},silent])),
 2331: 
 2332:     %% b) absolute path
 2333:     Relup = filename:join(Outdir1, "relup"),
 2334:     {ok,_,_,[]} = systools:make_relup(LatestName,[LatestName1],[LatestName1],
 2335: 				      [{outdir,Outdir1},
 2336: 				       {path,P},silent]),
 2337:     true = filelib:is_file(Relup),
 2338:     ok = file:delete(Relup),
 2339: 
 2340:     %% c) relative path
 2341:     {ok,_,_,[]} = systools:make_relup(LatestName,[LatestName1],[LatestName1],
 2342: 				      [{outdir,"./outdir1"},
 2343: 				       {path,P},silent]),
 2344:     true = filelib:is_file(Relup),
 2345:     ok = file:delete(Relup),
 2346: 
 2347:     %% d) absolute but incorrect path
 2348:     {error,_,{file_problem,{"relup",{open,enoent}}}} =
 2349: 	systools:make_relup(LatestName,[LatestName1],[LatestName1],
 2350: 			    [{outdir,Outdir2},{path,P},silent]),
 2351: 
 2352:     %% e) relative but incorrect path
 2353:     {error,_,{file_problem,{"relup",{open,enoent}}}} =
 2354: 	systools:make_relup(LatestName,[LatestName1],[LatestName1],
 2355: 			    [{outdir,"./outdir2"},{path,P},silent]),
 2356: 
 2357:     %% f) with .rel in another directory than cwd
 2358:     %% -- not necessary to test since relup by default is placed in
 2359:     %%    cwd, not in the same directory as the .rel file --
 2360: 
 2361:     %% Change back to previous working directory
 2362:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir),
 2363:     ok.
 2364: 
 2365: 
 2366: %% Test that all default values can be used as values in the .app file
 2367: app_file_defaults(Config) ->
 2368:     PrivDir = ?config(priv_dir,Config),
 2369:     Name = app1,
 2370:     NameStr = atom_to_list(Name),
 2371:     Vsn = "1.0",
 2372:     AppSpec = app_spec(Name,#{vsn=>"1.0"}),
 2373:     ok = file:write_file(filename:join(PrivDir,NameStr ++ ".app"),
 2374: 			 io_lib:format("~p.~n",[AppSpec])),
 2375:     {ok,_} = systools_make:read_application(NameStr,Vsn,[PrivDir],[]),
 2376:     ok.
 2377: 
 2378: app_spec(Name,New) ->
 2379:     {application,Name,app_spec(New)}.
 2380: 
 2381: app_spec(New) ->
 2382:     Default = #{description => "",
 2383: 		id => "",
 2384: 		vsn => "",
 2385: 		modules => [],
 2386: 		maxP => infinity,
 2387: 		maxT => infinity,
 2388: 		registered => [],
 2389: 		included_applications => [],
 2390: 		applications => [],
 2391: 		env => [],
 2392: 		mod => [],
 2393: 		start_phases => undefined,
 2394: 		runtime_dependencies => []},
 2395:     maps:to_list(maps:merge(Default,New)).
 2396: 
 2397: %%%%%%
 2398: %%%%%% Utilities
 2399: %%%%%%
 2400: 
 2401: check_script_path(RelName) ->
 2402:     {ok, [Conts]} = read_script_file(RelName),
 2403:     {script, {_, _}, ListOfThings} = Conts,
 2404:     case lists:keysearch(path, 1, ListOfThings) of
 2405: 	{value, {path, [$$,$R,$O,$O,$T | _]}} -> %"$ROOT..."
 2406: 	    false;
 2407: 	_ -> ok
 2408:     end.
 2409: 
 2410: check_var_script_file(VarDirs, NoExistDirs, RelName) ->
 2411:     {ok, [Conts]} = read_script_file(RelName),
 2412:     {script, {_, _}, ListOfThings} = Conts,
 2413:     AllPaths = lists:append(lists:map(fun({path, P}) -> P;
 2414: 					 (_)         -> []
 2415: 				      end,
 2416: 				      ListOfThings)),
 2417:     case lists:filter(fun(VarDir) -> lists:member(VarDir, AllPaths) end,
 2418: 		      VarDirs) of
 2419: 	VarDirs ->
 2420: 	    ok;
 2421: 	_ ->
 2422: 	    ct:fail("All variable dirs not in generated script")
 2423:     end,
 2424:     case lists:filter(fun(NoExistDir) -> lists:member(NoExistDir, AllPaths) end,
 2425: 		      NoExistDirs) of
 2426: 	[] ->
 2427: 	    ok;
 2428: 	_ ->
 2429: 	    ct:fail("Unexpected dirs in generated script")
 2430:     end.
 2431: 
 2432: check_include_script(RelName, ExpectedLoad, ExpectedStart) ->
 2433:     {ok, [Conts]} = read_script_file(RelName),
 2434:     {script, {_, _}, ListOfThings} = Conts,
 2435: 
 2436:     %% Check that the applications are loaded in given order !
 2437:     ActualLoad = 
 2438: 	[App || {apply,{application,load,[{application,App,_}]}} <- ListOfThings,
 2439: 		App=/=kernel,
 2440: 		App=/=stdlib],
 2441: 
 2442:     if ActualLoad =:= ExpectedLoad -> ok;
 2443:        true -> ct:fail({bad_load_order, ActualLoad, ExpectedLoad})
 2444:     end,
 2445: 
 2446:     %% Check that applications are started in given order !
 2447:     ActualStart =
 2448: 	[App || {apply,{application,start_boot,[App|_]}} <- ListOfThings,
 2449: 		App =/= kernel,
 2450: 		App =/= stdlib],
 2451: 
 2452:     if ActualStart =:= ExpectedStart -> ok;
 2453:        true -> ct:fail({bad_start_order, ActualStart,ExpectedStart})
 2454:     end,
 2455: 
 2456:     ok.
 2457: 
 2458: read_script_file(RelName) ->
 2459:     file:consult(RelName ++ ".script").
 2460: 
 2461: check_var_tar(Variable, RelName) ->
 2462:     Expected = tar_name(Variable),
 2463:     case check_tar(Expected,RelName) of
 2464: 	ok ->
 2465: 	    ok;
 2466: 	{error, {erroneous_tar_file, _, missing, _}} ->
 2467: 	    {error, {not_generated, Expected}}
 2468:     end.
 2469: 
 2470: exists_tar_file(Name) ->
 2471:     File = tar_name(Name),
 2472:     case filelib:is_regular(File) of
 2473: 	true ->
 2474: 	    ok = file:delete(File),
 2475: 	    true;
 2476: 	_ ->
 2477: 	    false
 2478:     end.
 2479: 
 2480: %% Take a snap of the generated tar file and check if a certain
 2481: %% file is included.
 2482: %% This ensures at least that the tar file is generated.
 2483: check_tar(File, RelName) ->
 2484:     TarContents = tar_contents(RelName),
 2485:     case lists:member(File,TarContents) of
 2486: 	true -> ok;
 2487: 	_    -> {error, {erroneous_tar_file, tar_name(RelName), missing, File}}
 2488:     end.
 2489: 
 2490: %% Check that the given files exist in the tar file, and that they are
 2491: %% not symlinks
 2492: check_tar_regular(PrivDir, Files, RelName) ->
 2493:     TmpDir = fname(PrivDir,tmp),
 2494:     ok = file:make_dir(TmpDir),
 2495:     ok = erl_tar:extract(tar_name(RelName),
 2496: 			 [{files,Files},{cwd,TmpDir},compressed]),
 2497:     R = lists:foldl(fun(File,Acc) ->
 2498: 			    case file:read_link_info(fname(TmpDir,File)) of 
 2499: 				{ok,#file_info{type=regular}} ->
 2500: 				    Acc;
 2501: 				{ok,#file_info{type=Other}} ->
 2502: 				    [{File,Other}|Acc];
 2503: 				_ ->
 2504: 				    [{File,missing}|Acc]
 2505: 			    end
 2506: 		    end,
 2507: 		    [],
 2508: 		    Files),
 2509:     delete_tree(TmpDir),
 2510:     case R of
 2511: 	[] ->
 2512: 	    ok;
 2513: 	NotThere ->
 2514: 	    {error,{erroneous_tar_file,tar_name(RelName),NotThere}}
 2515:     end.
 2516: 
 2517: delete_tree(Dir) ->
 2518:     case filelib:is_dir(Dir) of
 2519: 	true ->
 2520: 	    {ok,Files} = file:list_dir(Dir),
 2521: 	    lists:foreach(fun(File) -> delete_tree(filename:join(Dir,File)) end, 
 2522: 			  Files),
 2523: 	    file:del_dir(Dir);
 2524: 	false ->
 2525: 	    ok = file:delete(Dir)
 2526:     end.
 2527: 
 2528: tar_contents(Name) ->
 2529:     {ok, Cont} = erl_tar:table(tar_name(Name), [compressed]),
 2530:     Cont.
 2531: 
 2532: tar_name(Name) ->
 2533:     Name ++ ".tar.gz".
 2534: 
 2535: create_script(latest,Config) ->
 2536:     Apps = core_apps(current) ++ [{db,"2.1"},{fe,"3.1"}],
 2537:     do_create_script(latest,Config,"4.4",Apps);
 2538: create_script(latest_no_mod_vsn,Config) ->
 2539:     Apps = core_apps(current) ++ [{db,"3.1"},{fe,"3.1"}],
 2540:     do_create_script(latest_no_mod_vsn,Config,"4.4",Apps);
 2541: create_script(latest0,Config) ->
 2542:     Apps = core_apps("1.0") ++ [{db,"2.1"},{fe,"3.1"}],
 2543:     do_create_script(latest0,Config,"4.4",Apps);
 2544: create_script(latest0_current_erts,Config) ->
 2545:     Apps = core_apps("1.0") ++ [{db,"2.1"},{fe,"3.1"}],
 2546:     do_create_script(latest0_current_erts,Config,current,Apps);
 2547: create_script(latest1,Config) ->
 2548:     Apps = core_apps("1.0") ++ [{db,"1.0"},{fe,"3.1"}],
 2549:     do_create_script(latest1,Config,"4.4",Apps);
 2550: create_script(latest1_no_sasl,Config) ->
 2551:     Apps = [{kernel,"1.0"},{stdlib,"1.0"},{db,"1.0"},{fe,"3.1"}],
 2552:     do_create_script(latest1_no_sasl,Config,"4.4",Apps);
 2553: create_script(latest2,Config) ->
 2554:     Apps = core_apps("1.0") ++ [{db,"1.0"},{fe,"2.1"}],
 2555:     do_create_script(latest2,Config,"4.3",Apps);
 2556: create_script(latest_small,Config) ->
 2557:     Apps = core_apps("1.0") ++ [{fe,"3.1"}],
 2558:     do_create_script(latest_small,Config,"4.4",Apps);
 2559: create_script(latest_small0,Config) ->		%Differs in fe vsn
 2560:     Apps = core_apps("1.0") ++ [{fe,"2.1"}],
 2561:     do_create_script(latest_small0,Config,"4.4",Apps);
 2562: create_script(latest_small1,Config) ->
 2563:     Apps = core_apps("1.0") ++ [{fe,"500.18.7"}],
 2564:     do_create_script(latest_small1,Config,"4.4",Apps);
 2565: create_script(latest_small2,Config) ->
 2566:     Apps = core_apps("1.0") ++ [{fe,"2.1.1"}],
 2567:     do_create_script(latest_small2,Config,"4.4",Apps);
 2568: create_script(latest_nokernel,Config) ->
 2569:     Apps = [{db,"2.1"},{fe,"3.1"}],
 2570:     do_create_script(latest_nokernel,Config,"4.4",Apps);
 2571: create_script(latest_kernel_start_type,Config) ->
 2572:     Apps = [{kernel,"1.0",load},{stdlib,"1.0"},{db,"2.1"},{fe,"3.1"}],
 2573:     do_create_script(latest_kernel_start_type,Config,"4.4",Apps);
 2574: create_script(latest_stdlib_start_type,Config) ->
 2575:     Apps = [{kernel,"1.0"},{stdlib,"1.0",load},{db,"2.1"},{fe,"3.1"}],
 2576:     do_create_script(latest_stdlib_start_type,Config,"4.4",Apps);
 2577: create_script(latest_no_stdlib,Config) ->
 2578:     Apps = [{kernel,"1.0"},{db,"2.1"},{fe,"3.1"}],
 2579:     do_create_script(latest_no_stdlib,Config,"4.4",Apps);
 2580: create_script(latest_app_start_type1,Config) ->
 2581:     Apps = core_apps(current),
 2582:     do_create_script(latest_app_start_type1,Config,current,Apps);
 2583: create_script(latest_app_start_type2,Config) ->
 2584:     OtherApps = [{mnesia,current,permanent},
 2585: 		 {runtime_tools,current,transient},
 2586: 		 {snmp,current,load},
 2587: 		 {xmerl,current,none}],
 2588:     Apps = core_apps(current) ++ OtherApps,
 2589:     do_create_script(latest_app_start_type2,Config,current,Apps);
 2590: create_script(latest_t21, Config) ->
 2591:     Apps = core_apps(current) ++ [{t21, "1.0"}],
 2592:     do_create_script(latest_t21, Config, "4.4", Apps);
 2593: create_script(latest_t22, Config) ->
 2594:     Apps = core_apps(current) ++ [{t22, "1.0"}],
 2595:     do_create_script(latest_t22, Config, "4.4", Apps);
 2596: create_script(current_all_no_sasl,Config) ->
 2597:     Apps = [{kernel,current},{stdlib,current},{db,"2.1"},{fe,"3.1"}],
 2598:     do_create_script(current_all_no_sasl,Config,current,Apps);
 2599: create_script(current_all,Config) ->
 2600:     Apps = core_apps(current) ++ [{db,"2.1"}],
 2601:     do_create_script(current_all,Config,current,Apps);
 2602: create_script(current_all_future_erts,Config) ->
 2603:     Apps = core_apps(current) ++ [{db,"2.1"},{fe,"3.1"}],
 2604:     do_create_script(current_all_future_erts,Config,"99.99",Apps);
 2605: create_script(current_all_future_sasl,Config) ->
 2606:     Apps = [{kernel,current},{stdlib,current},{sasl,"9.9"},{db,"2.1"},{fe,"3.1"}],
 2607:     do_create_script(current_all_future_sasl,Config,current,Apps);
 2608: create_script({unicode,RelVsn},Config) ->
 2609:     Apps = core_apps(current) ++ [{ua,"1.0"}],
 2610:     do_create_script(unicode,RelVsn,Config,current,Apps);
 2611: create_script(duplicate_modules,Config) ->
 2612:     Apps = core_apps(current) ++ [{app1,"1.0"},{app2,"1.0"}],
 2613:     do_create_script(duplicate_modules,Config,current,Apps);
 2614: create_script(replace_app0,Config) ->
 2615:     Apps = core_apps(current) ++ [{db,"1.1"},{gh,"1.0"}],
 2616:     do_create_script(repace_app0,Config,current,Apps);
 2617: create_script(replace_app1,Config) ->
 2618:     Apps = core_apps(current) ++ [{db,"1.0"},{fe,"2.1"}],
 2619:     do_create_script(repace_app1,Config,current,Apps);
 2620: create_script(optional_apps_missing,Config) ->
 2621:     Apps = core_apps(current) ++ [{app1,"1.0"}],
 2622:     do_create_script(optional_apps_missing,Config,current,Apps);
 2623: create_script(optional_apps_all,Config) ->
 2624:     Apps = core_apps(current) ++ [{app1,"1.0"},{app2,"1.0"}],
 2625:     do_create_script(optional_apps_all,Config,current,Apps).
 2626: 
 2627: do_create_script(Id,Config,ErtsVsn,AppVsns) ->
 2628:     do_create_script(Id,string:to_upper(atom_to_list(Id)),Config,ErtsVsn,AppVsns).
 2629: do_create_script(Id,RelVsn,Config,ErtsVsn,AppVsns) ->
 2630:     PrivDir = ?privdir,
 2631:     Name = fname(PrivDir, Id),
 2632:     {ok,Fd} = file:open(Name++".rel",write),
 2633:     RelfileContent =
 2634: 	{release,{"Test release", RelVsn},
 2635: 	 {erts,erts_vsn(ErtsVsn)},
 2636: 	 app_vsns(AppVsns)},
 2637:     io:format(Fd,"~p.~n",[RelfileContent]),
 2638:     ok = file:close(Fd),
 2639:     {filename:dirname(Name), filename:basename(Name)}.
 2640: 
 2641: core_apps(Vsn) ->
 2642:     [{App,Vsn} || App <- [kernel,stdlib,sasl]].
 2643: 
 2644: app_vsns(AppVsns) ->
 2645:     [{App,app_vsn(App,Vsn)} || {App,Vsn} <- AppVsns] ++
 2646: 	[{App,app_vsn(App,Vsn),Type} || {App,Vsn,Type} <- AppVsns].
 2647: app_vsn(App,current) ->
 2648:     case application:load(App) of
 2649: 	Ok when Ok==ok; Ok=={error,{already_loaded,App}} ->
 2650: 	    {ok,Vsn} = application:get_key(App,vsn),
 2651: 	    Vsn;
 2652: 	Error ->
 2653: 	    throw(Error)
 2654:     end;
 2655: app_vsn(_App,Vsn) ->
 2656:     Vsn.
 2657: 
 2658: erts_vsn(current) -> erlang:system_info(version);
 2659: erts_vsn(Vsn) -> Vsn.
 2660: 
 2661: 
 2662: create_include_files(inc1, Config) ->
 2663:     PrivDir = ?privdir,
 2664:     Name = fname(PrivDir, inc1),
 2665:     create_apps(PrivDir),
 2666: 
 2667:     Apps = application_controller:which_applications(),
 2668:     {value,{_,_,KernelVer}} = lists:keysearch(kernel,1,Apps),
 2669:     {value,{_,_,StdlibVer}} = lists:keysearch(stdlib,1,Apps),
 2670: 
 2671:     Rel = "{release, {\"test\",\"R1A\"}, {erts, \"45\"},\n"
 2672: 	" [{kernel, \"" ++ KernelVer ++ "\"}, {stdlib, \""
 2673: 	++ StdlibVer ++ "\"},\n"
 2674: 	"  {t6, \"1.0\"}, {t5, \"1.0\"}, \n"
 2675: 	"  {t4, \"1.0\"}, {t3, \"1.0\"}, {t2, \"1.0\"}, \n"
 2676: 	"  {t1, \"1.0\"}]}.\n",
 2677:     file:write_file(Name ++ ".rel", list_to_binary(Rel)),
 2678:     {filename:dirname(Name), filename:basename(Name)};
 2679:

 2687:     {value,{_,_,StdlibVer}} = lists:keysearch(stdlib,1,Apps),
 2688:

 2690:     Rel = "{release, {\"test\",\"R1A\"}, {erts, \"45\"},\n"
 2691: 	" [{kernel, \"" ++ KernelVer ++ "\"}, {stdlib, \""
 2692: 	++ StdlibVer ++ "\"},\n"

 2790: 	++ StdlibVer ++ "\"},\n"
 2791: 	"  {t7, \"1.0\"}, {t6, \"1.0\"}, {t5, \"1.0\"}, \n"
 2792: 	"  {t4, \"1.0\"}, {t3, \"1.0\"}, {t2, \"1.0\"}, \n"
 2793: 	"  {t1, \"1.0\"}]}.\n",
 2794:     file:write_file(Name ++ ".rel", list_to_binary(Rel)),
 2795:     {filename:dirname(Name), filename:basename(Name)};
 2796: 
 2797: create_include_files(inc8, Config) ->
 2798:     PrivDir = ?privdir,
 2799:     Name = fname(PrivDir, inc8),
 2800:     create_circular_apps(PrivDir),
 2801: 
 2802:     Apps = application_controller:which_applications(),
 2803:     {value,{_,_,KernelVer}} = lists:keysearch(kernel,1,Apps),
 2804:     {value,{_,_,StdlibVer}} = lists:keysearch(stdlib,1,Apps),
 2805: 
 2806:     %% t8 uses t9 and t10 includes t9 !
 2807:     Rel = "{release, {\"test\",\"R1A\"}, {erts, \"45\"},\n"
 2808: 	" [{kernel, \"" ++ KernelVer ++ "\"}, {stdlib, \""
 2809: 	++ StdlibVer ++ "\"},\n"
 2810: 	"  {t8, \"1.0\"}, {t9, \"1.0\"}, {t10, \"1.0\"}]}.\n",
 2811:     file:write_file(Name ++ ".rel", list_to_binary(Rel)),
 2812:     {filename:dirname(Name), filename:basename(Name)};
 2813: 
 2814: create_include_files(inc9, Config) ->
 2815:     PrivDir = ?privdir,
 2816:     Name = fname(PrivDir, inc9),
 2817:     create_circular_apps(PrivDir),
 2818: 
 2819:     Apps = application_controller:which_applications(),
 2820:     {value,{_,_,KernelVer}} = lists:keysearch(kernel,1,Apps),
 2821:     {value,{_,_,StdlibVer}} = lists:keysearch(stdlib,1,Apps),
 2822: 
 2823:     %% t8 uses t9, t9 uses t10 and t10 includes t8 ==> circular !!
 2824:     Rel = "{release, {\"test\",\"R1A\"}, {erts, \"45\"},\n"
 2825: 	" [{kernel, \"" ++ KernelVer ++ "\"}, {stdlib, \""
 2826: 	++ StdlibVer ++ "\"},\n"
 2827: 	"  {t8, \"1.0\"}, {t9, \"1.0\"}, {t10, \"1.0\", [t8]}]}.\n",
 2828:     file:write_file(Name ++ ".rel", list_to_binary(Rel)),
 2829:     {filename:dirname(Name), filename:basename(Name)};
 2830: 
 2831: create_include_files(inc10, Config) ->
 2832:     PrivDir = ?privdir,
 2833:     Name = fname(PrivDir, inc10),
 2834:     create_circular_apps(PrivDir),
 2835: 
 2836:     Apps = application_controller:which_applications(),
 2837:     {value,{_,_,KernelVer}} = lists:keysearch(kernel,1,Apps),
 2838:     {value,{_,_,StdlibVer}} = lists:keysearch(stdlib,1,Apps),
 2839: 
 2840:     %% t9 tries to include not specified (in .app file) application !
 2841:     Rel = "{release, {\"test\",\"R1A\"}, {erts, \"45\"},\n"
 2842: 	" [{kernel, \"" ++ KernelVer ++ "\"}, {stdlib, \""
 2843: 	++ StdlibVer ++ "\"},\n"
 2844: 	"  {t8, \"1.0\"}, {t9, \"1.0\", [t7]}, {t10, \"1.0\"}]}.\n",
 2845:     file:write_file(Name ++ ".rel", list_to_binary(Rel)),
 2846:     {filename:dirname(Name), filename:basename(Name)};
 2847:

 2927: create_apps(Dir) ->
 2928:     T1 = "{application, t1,\n"
 2929: 	" [{vsn, \"1.0\"},\n"
 2930: 	"  {description, \"test\"},\n"
 2931: 	"  {modules, []},\n"
 2932: 	"  {applications, [kernel, stdlib]},\n"
 2933: 	"  {registered, []}]}.\n",
 2934:     file:write_file(fname(Dir, 't1.app'), list_to_binary(T1)),
 2935: 
 2936:     T2 = "{application, t2,\n"
 2937: 	" [{vsn, \"1.0\"},\n"
 2938: 	"  {description, \"test\"},\n"
 2939: 	"  {modules, []},\n"
 2940: 	"  {applications, [t1]},\n"
 2941: 	"  {registered, []}]}.\n",
 2942:     file:write_file(fname(Dir, 't2.app'), list_to_binary(T2)),
 2943: 
 2944:     T3 = "{application, t3,\n"
 2945: 	" [{vsn, \"1.0\"},\n"
 2946: 	"  {description, \"test\"},\n"
 2947: 	"  {modules, []},\n"
 2948: 	"  {applications, []},\n"
 2949: 	"  {included_applications, [t2]},\n"
 2950: 	"  {registered, []}]}.\n",
 2951:     file:write_file(fname(Dir, 't3.app'), list_to_binary(T3)),
 2952: 
 2953:     T4 = "{application, t4,\n"
 2954: 	" [{vsn, \"1.0\"},\n"
 2955: 	"  {description, \"test\"},\n"
 2956: 	"  {modules, []},\n"
 2957: 	"  {applications, [t3]},\n"
 2958: 	"  {included_applications, []},\n"
 2959: 	"  {registered, []}]}.\n",
 2960:     file:write_file(fname(Dir, 't4.app'), list_to_binary(T4)),
 2961: 
 2962:     T5 = "{application, t5,\n"
 2963: 	" [{vsn, \"1.0\"},\n"
 2964: 	"  {description, \"test\"},\n"
 2965: 	"  {modules, []},\n"
 2966: 	"  {applications, [t3]},\n"
 2967: 	"  {included_applications, []},\n"
 2968: 	"  {registered, []}]}.\n",

 2970:

 2975: 	"  {applications, []},\n"

 2977: 	"  {registered, []}]}.\n",
 2978:     file:write_file(fname(Dir, 't6.app'), list_to_binary(T6)).

 3137: create_apps_duplicate_entry(Dir) ->
 3138:     T21 = "{application, t21,\n"
 3139:     " [{vsn, \"1.0\"},\n"
 3140:     "  {description, \"test\"},\n"
 3141:     "  {modules, []},\n"
 3142:     "  {applications, []},\n"
 3143:     "  {included_applications, []},\n"
 3144:     "  {registered, [test, test]}]}.\n",
 3145:     file:write_file(fname(Dir, 't21.app'), list_to_binary(T21)),
 3146:     T22 = "{application, t22,\n"
 3147:     " [{vsn, \"1.0\"},\n"
 3148:     "  {description, \"test\"},\n"
 3149:     "  {modules, []},\n"
 3150:     "  {applications, []},\n"
 3151:     "  {included_applications, []},\n"
 3152:     "  {registered, [test]}]}.\n",
 3153:     file:write_file(fname(Dir, 't22.app'), list_to_binary(T22)).
 3154: 
 3155: fname(N) ->
 3156:     filename:join(N).
 3157: 
 3158: fname(Dir, Basename) ->
 3159:     filename:join(Dir, Basename).
